name: Master Ball
description:
The best BALL with the ultimate
performance. It will catch any wild
POKéMON without fail.

name: Ultra Ball
description:
A very high-grade BALL that offers
a higher POKéMON catch rate than
a GREAT BALL.

name: Great Ball
description:
A good, quality BALL that offers
a higher POKéMON catch rate than
a standard POKé BALL.

name: Poké Ball
description:
A BALL thrown to catch a wild
POKéMON. It is designed in a
capsule style.

name: Safari Ball
description:
A special BALL that is used only in
the SAFARI ZONE. It is finished in
a camouflage pattern.

name: Net Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on WATER- and
BUG-type POKéMON.

name: Dive Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on POKéMON
deep in the sea.

name: Nest Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on weaker
POKéMON.

name: Repeat Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on POKéMON
caught before.

name: Timer Ball
description:
A somewhat different BALL that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

name: Luxury Ball
description:
A comfortable BALL that makes a
captured wild POKéMON quickly grow
friendly.

name: Premier Ball
description:
A rare BALL that has been
specially made to commemorate an
event of some sort.

name: Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 20 points.

name: Antidote
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals one POKéMON from a
poisoning.

name: Burn Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals one POKéMON of a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a frozen POKéMON.

name: Awakening
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It awakens a sleeping POKéMON.

name: Parlyz Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals one POKéMON from
paralysis.

name: Full Restore
description:
A medicine that fully restores the
HP and heals any status problems
of one POKéMON.

name: Max Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It fully restores the HP of one
POKéMON.

name: Hyper Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 200 points.

name: Super Potion
description:
A spray-type wound medicine.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 50 points.

name: Full Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals all the status problems of
one POKéMON.

name: Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
POKéMON, restoring HP by half the
maximum amount.

name: Max Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
POKéMON, restoring HP fully.

name: Fresh Water
description:
Water with a high mineral content.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 50 points.

name: Soda Pop
description:
A fizzy soda drink.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 60 points.

name: Lemonade
description:
A very sweet drink.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 80 points.

name: Moomoo Milk
description:
Highly nutritious milk.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 100 points.

name: Energy Powder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 50 points.

name: Energy Root
description:
A very bitter root.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 200 points.

name: Heal Powder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It heals all the status problems of
one POKéMON.

name: Revival Herb
description:
A very bitter medicinal herb.
It revives a fainted POKéMON,
restoring HP fully.

name: Ether
description:
Restores a selected move's PP by
10 points for one POKéMON.

name: Max Ether
description:
Fully restores a selected move's PP
for one POKéMON.

name: Elixir
description:
Restores the PP of all moves for
one POKéMON by 10 points each.

name: Max Elixir
description:
Fully restores the PP of all moves
for one POKéMON.

name: Lava Cookie
description:
LAVARIDGE TOWN's local specialty.
It heals all the status problems of
one POKéMON.

name: Blue Flute
description:
A blue glass flute that awakens
a sleeping POKéMON.

name: Yellow Flute
description:
A yellow glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of confusion.

name: Red Flute
description:
A red glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of infatuation.

name: Black Flute
description:
A black glass flute.
When blown, it makes wild POKéMON
less likely to appear.

name: White Flute
description:
A white glass flute.
When blown, it makes wild POKéMON
more likely to appear.

name: Berry Juice
description:
A 100% pure juice.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 20 points.

name: Sacred Ash
description:
Revives all fainted POKéMON,
restoring HP fully.

name: Shoal Salt
description:
Pure salt obtained from deep inside
the SHOAL CAVE. It is extremely
salty.

name: Shoal Shell
description:
A pretty seashell found deep inside
the SHOAL CAVE. It is striped in
blue and white.

name: Red Shard
description:
A small red shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Blue Shard
description:
A small blue shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Yellow Shard
description:
A small yellow shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Green Shard
description:
A small green shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
a tool made long ago.

name: Hp Up
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base HP of one
POKéMON.

name: Protein
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base ATTACK stat of
one POKéMON.

name: Iron
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base DEFENSE stat of
one POKéMON.

name: Carbos
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base SPEED stat of
one POKéMON.

name: Calcium
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base SP. ATK stat
of one POKéMON.

name: Rare Candy
description:
A candy that is packed with energy.
It raises the level of a POKéMON
by one.

name: Pp Up
description:
Slightly raises the maximum PP of
a selected move for one POKéMON.

name: Zinc
description:
A nutritious drink for POKéMON.
It raises the base SP. DEF stat
of one POKéMON.

name: Pp Max
description:
Raises the PP of a selected move
to its maximum level for one
POKéMON.

name: Guard Spec.
description:
An item that prevents stat reduction
among party POKéMON for five turns
after use.

name: Dire Hit
description:
Raises the critical-hit ratio of
POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the
POKéMON is withdrawn.

name: X Attack
description:
Raises the ATTACK stat of POKéMON
in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON
is withdrawn.

name: X Defend
description:
Raises the DEFENSE stat of POKéMON
in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON
is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description:
Raises the SPEED stat of POKéMON
in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON
is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy
description:
Raises the accuracy stat of
POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the
POKéMON is withdrawn.

name: X Special
description:
Raises the SP. ATK stat of
POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the
POKéMON is withdrawn.

name: Poké Doll
description:
An attractive doll.
Use it to flee from any battle with
a wild POKéMON.

name: Fluffy Tail
description:
An attractive item.
Use it to flee from any battle with
a wild POKéMON.

name: Super Repel
description:
Prevents weak wild POKéMON from
appearing for 200 steps.

name: Max Repel
description:
Prevents weak wild POKéMON from
appearing for 250 steps.

name: Escape Rope
description:
A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a
cave or a dungeon.

name: Repel
description:
Prevents weak wild POKéMON from
appearing for 100 steps.

name: Sun Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is as red as the sun.

name: Moon Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is as black as the night sky.

name: Fire Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is colored orange.

name: Thunderstone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It has a thunderbolt pattern.

name: Water Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is a clear light blue.

name: Leaf Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

name: Tinymushroom
description:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is quite popular among certain
people.

name: Big Mushroom
description:
A large and rare mushroom.
It is very popular among certain
people.

name: Pearl
description:
A relatively small pearl that
sparkles in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply.

name: Big Pearl
description:
A quite-large pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Stardust
description:
A pretty red sand with a loose,
silky feel.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Star Piece
description:
A shard of a pretty gem that
sparkles in a red color.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Nugget
description:
A nugget of pure gold that gives
off a lustrous gleam.
It can be sold at a high price.

name: Heart Scale
description:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that
is extremely rare. It glows faintly
in the colors of a rainbow.

name: Orange Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
ZIGZAGOON print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Harbor Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
WINGULL print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Glitter Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
PIKACHU print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Mech Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
MAGNEMITE print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Wood Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
SLAKOTH print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Wave Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
WAILMER print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Bead Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL to be held by a
POKéMON. It will bear the print of
the POKéMON holding it.

name: Shadow Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
DUSKULL print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Tropic Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
BELLOSSOM print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Dream Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL to be held by a
POKéMON. It will bear the print of
the POKéMON holding it.

name: Fab Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a
gorgeous, extravagant print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Retro Mail
description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a print
of three cute POKéMON.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.

name: Cheri Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to heal paralysis.

name: Chesto Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to wake up.

name: Pecha Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to cure poison.

name: Rawst Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to heal a burn.

name: Aspear Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle for defrosting.

name: Leppa Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to restore 10 PP.

name: Oran Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to restore 10 HP.

name: Persim Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to lift confusion.

name: Lum Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to heal any problem.

name: Sitrus Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to restore 30 HP.

name: Figy Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Wiki Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Mago Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Aguav Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Iapapa Berry
description:
A hold item that restores HP but
may cause confusion when used.

name: Razz Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Bluk Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Nanab Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Wepear Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Pinap Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Pomeg Berry
description:
Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base HP.

name: Kelpsy Berry
description:
Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base ATTACK.

name: Qualot Berry
description:
Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base DEFENSE.

name: Hondew Berry
description:
Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base SP. ATK.

name: Grepa Berry
description:
Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base SP. DEF.

name: Tamato Berry
description:
Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base SPEED.

name: Cornn Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Magost Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Rabuta Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Nomel Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Spelon Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Pamtre Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Watmel Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Durin Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Belue Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Liechi Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the ATTACK stat in a pinch.

name: Ganlon Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the DEFENSE stat in a pinch.

name: Salac Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the SPEED stat in a pinch.

name: Petaya Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the SP. ATK stat in a pinch.

name: Apicot Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the SP. DEF stat in a pinch.

name: Lansat Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it raises
the critical-hit ratio in a pinch.

name: Starf Berry
description:
When held by a POKéMON, it sharply
raises one stat in a pinch.

name: Enigma Berry
description:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

name: Brightpowder
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It casts a tricky glare that lowers
the opponent's accuracy.

name: White Herb
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It restores any lowered stat in
battle. It can be used only once.

name: Macho Brace
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It promotes strong growth but
lowers SPEED while it is held.

name: Exp. Share
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holder gets a share of EXP.
points without having to battle.

name: Quick Claw
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A light and sharp claw. The holder
may be able to strike first.

name: Soothe Bell
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A bell with a comforting chime that
makes the holder calm and friendly.

name: Mental Herb
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It snaps the holder out of
infatuation. It can be used once.

name: Choice Band
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It powers up one move, which
becomes the only usable one.

name: King'S Rock
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It may cause the foe to flinch
upon taking damage.

name: Silver Powder
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A shiny silver powder that boosts
the power of BUG-type moves.

name: Amulet Coin
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It doubles the battle money if the
holding POKéMON takes part.

name: Cleanse Tag
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It repels wild POKéMON if the
holder is first in the party.

name: Soul Dew
description:
An orb to be held by a LATIOS or
LATIAS. It raises the SP. ATK
and SP. DEF stats.

name: Deepseatooth
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A fang that gleams a sharp silver.
It raises the SP. ATK stat.

name: Deepseascale
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A scale that shines a faint pink.
It raises the SP. DEF stat.

name: Smoke Ball
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON can flee from
any wild POKéMON for sure.

name: Everstone
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON is prevented
from evolving.

name: Focus Band
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON may endure an
attack, leaving just 1 HP.

name: Lucky Egg
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
An egg filled with happiness that
earns extra EXP. points in battle.

name: Scope Lens
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A lens that boosts the critical-hit
ratio of the holding POKéMON.

name: Metal Coat
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A special metallic film that boosts
the power of STEEL-type moves.

name: Leftovers
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON gradually
regains HP during battle.

name: Dragon Scale
description:
A thick and tough scale.
A DRAGON-type POKéMON may be
holding it.

name: Light Ball
description:
An orb to be held by a PIKACHU
that raises the SP. ATK stat.
Touching it may cause a shock.

name: Soft Sand
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A loose, silky sand that boosts the
power of GROUND-type moves.

name: Hard Stone
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
An unbreakable stone that boosts
the power of ROCK-type moves.

name: Miracle Seed
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A seed imbued with life that boosts
the power of GRASS-type moves.

name: Blackglasses
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A shady-looking pair of glasses
that boosts DARK-type moves.

name: Black Belt
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A belt that boosts determination
and FIGHTING-type moves.

name: Magnet
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A powerful magnet that boosts the
power of ELECTRIC-type moves.

name: Mystic Water
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A teardrop-shaped gem that boosts
the power of WATER-type moves.

name: Sharp Beak
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A long, sharp beak that boosts the
power of FLYING-type moves.

name: Poison Barb
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A small, poisonous barb that boosts
the power of POISON-type moves.

name: Nevermeltice
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts ICE-type moves.

name: Spell Tag
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A sinister, eerie tag that boosts
GHOST-type moves.

name: Twistedspoon
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A spoon imbued with telekinetic
power boosts PSYCHIC-type moves.

name: Charcoal
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A combustible fuel that boosts the
power of FIRE-type moves.

name: Dragon Fang
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A hard and sharp fang that boosts
the power of DRAGON-type moves.

name: Silk Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A sumptuous scarf that boosts the
power of NORMAL-type moves.

name: Up-grade
description:
A transparent device filled with all
sorts of data.
It is made by SILPH CO.

name: Shell Bell
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON regains some
HP upon striking the foe.

name: Sea Incense
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It slightly boosts the power of
WATER-type moves.

name: Lax Incense
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
Its tricky aroma slightly reduces
the foe's accuracy.

name: Lucky Punch
description:
A glove to be held by a CHANSEY.
It raises CHANSEY's critical-hit
ratio.

name: Metal Powder
description:
A fine, hard powder to be held by
a DITTO.
It raises DITTO's DEFENSE stat.

name: Thick Club
description:
A hard bone of some sort to be
held by a CUBONE or MAROWAK.
It raises the ATTACK stat.

name: Stick
description:
A stick of leek to be held by a
FARFETCH'D. It raises FARFETCH'D's
critical-hit ratio.

name: Red Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON's
COOL condition in CONTESTS.

name: Blue Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON's
BEAUTY condition in CONTESTS.

name: Pink Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON's
CUTE condition in CONTESTS.

name: Green Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON's
SMART condition in CONTESTS.

name: Yellow Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON's
TOUGH condition in CONTESTS.

name: Mach Bike
description:
A folding bicycle that is at least
twice as fast as walking.

name: Coin Case
description:
A case for holding COINS obtained
at the GAME CORNER.
It holds up to 9,999 COINS.

name: Itemfinder
description:
A device used for finding items.
If there is a hidden item nearby
when it is used, it emits a signal.

name: Old Rod
description:
An old and beat-up fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to
fish for wild POKéMON.

name: Good Rod
description:
A new, good-quality fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to
fish for wild POKéMON.

name: Super Rod
description:
An awesome, high-tech fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for wild POKéMON.

name: S.S. Ticket
description:
The ticket required for sailing on
the ferry S.S. ANNE.
It has a drawing of a ship on it.

name: Contest Pass
description:
The pass required for entering
POKéMON CONTESTS. It has a
drawing of an award ribbon on it.

name: Wailmer Pail
description:
A nifty watering pail.
Use it to promote strong growth in
BERRIES planted in soft soil.

name: Devon Goods
description:
A package that contains mechanical
parts of some sort made by the
DEVON CORPORATION.

name: Soot Sack
description:
A sack used to collect volcanic
ash automatically during walks
over deep ash.

name: Basement Key
description:
The key to NEW MAUVILLE, which
was constructed beneath MAUVILLE
CITY.

name: Acro Bike
description:
A folding bicycle that is capable
of stunts like jumps and wheelies.

name: Pokéblock Case
description:
A case for holding POKéBLOCKS made
with a BERRY BLENDER. It releases
one POKéBLOCK when shaken.

name: Letter
description:
An extremely important letter to
STEVEN from the PRESIDENT of the
DEVON CORPORATION.

name: Eon Ticket
description:
The ticket required for sailing on a
ferry to a distant southern island.
It features a drawing of an island.

name: Red Orb
description:
An orb that glows red.
It is said to contain an incredible
power from ancient times.

name: Blue Orb
description:
An orb that glows blue.
It is said to contain an incredible
power from ancient times.

name: Scanner
description:
A device used to search for
life-forms in water.
It looks too difficult to use.

name: Go-goggles
description:
A pair of protective goggles.
They enable a TRAINER to travel
through even desert sandstorms.

name: Meteorite
description:
A meteorite that fell from space
onto MT. MOON long ago.
It is very lumpy and hard.

name: Rm. 1 Key
description:
A key that opens the door to Room
1 inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
It is old and looks easily broken.

name: Rm. 2 Key
description:
A key that opens the door to Room
2 inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
It is old and looks easily broken.

name: Rm. 4 Key
description:
A key that opens the door to Room
4 inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
It is old and looks easily broken.

name: Rm. 6 Key
description:
A key that opens the door to Room
6 inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
It is old and looks easily broken.

name: Storage Key
description:
A key that opens the storage hold
inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
It is old and looks easily broken.

name: Root Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

name: Claw Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a claw.

name: Devon Scope
description:
A scope that signals the presence
of any unseeable POKéMON.
It is made by the DEVON CORP.

name: TM - Focus Punch
description:
The user focuses its mind before
launching a punch. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.

name: TM - Dragon Claw
description:
The user slashes the target with
huge, sharp claws.

name: TM - Water Pulse
description:
The user attacks the target with a
pulsing blast of water. It may also
confuse the target.

name: TM - Calm Mind
description:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and calms its spirit to raise its
Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Roar
description:
The target is scared off and
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Toxic
description:
A move that leaves the target badly
poisoned. Its poison damage worsens
every turn.

name: TM - Snowscape
description:
A snowstorm forms on the field for 5
turns. Snow boosts the Defense stat
of Ice-types by 50%.

name: TM - Bulk Up
description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up its body, boosting both its
Attack and Defense stats.

name: TM - Bullet Seed
description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the target. Two to five seeds are
shot in rapid succession.

name: TM - Hidden Power
description:
An attack which varies in type
depending on its user. Its type may
be changed with 40 Gems.

name: TM - Sunny Day
description:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up Fire-type
moves.

name: TM - Taunt
description:
The target is taunted into a rage
that allows it to use only attack
moves for three turns.

name: TM - Ice Beam
description:
The target is struck with an
icy-cold beam of energy. It may
also freeze the target solid.

name: TM - Blizzard
description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the opposing team. It may
also freeze them solid.

name: TM - Hyper Beam
description:
The target is attacked with a
powerful beam. The user must rest
on the next turn to regain its
energy.

name: TM - Light Screen
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from special
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Protect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Rain Dance
description:
The user summons a heavy rain that
falls for five turns, powering up
Water-type moves.

name: TM - Giga Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's HP is restored by half the
damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Safeguard
description:
The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems for
five turns.

name: TM - Frustration
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - SolarBeam
description:
A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam
on the second turn.

name: TM - Iron Tail
description:
The target is slammed with a
steel-hard tail. It may also lower
the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Thunderbolt
description:
A strong electric blast is loosed at
the target. It may also leave the
target with paralysis.

name: TM - Thunder
description:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on
the target to inflict damage. It
may also leave the target with
paralysis.

name: TM - Earthquake
description:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes those around it.

name: TM - Return
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - Dig
description:
The user burrows, then attacks on
the second turn. It can also be
used to exit dungeons.

name: TM - Psychic
description:
The target is hit by a strong
telekinetic force. It may also
reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Shadow Ball
description:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the
target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Brick Break
description:
The user attacks with a swift chop.
It can also break any barrier such
as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: TM - Double Team
description:
By moving rapidly, the user makes
illusory copies of itself to raise
its evasiveness.

name: TM - Reflect
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from physical
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Shock Wave
description:
The user strikes the target with a
quick jolt of electricity. This
attack cannot be evaded.

name: TM - Flamethrower
description:
The target is scorched with an
intense blast of fire. It may also
leave the target with a burn.

name: TM - Sludge Bomb
description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target. It may also poison the
target.

name: TM - Sandstorm
description:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to
hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

name: TM - Fire Blast
description:
The target is attacked with an
intense blast of all-consuming
fire. It may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: TM - Rock Tomb
description:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
It also lowers the target's Speed
by preventing its movement.

name: TM - Aerial Ace
description:
The user confounds the target with
speed, then slashes. The attack
lands without fail.

name: TM - Torment
description:
The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of
using the same move twice in a
row.

name: TM - Facade
description:
An attack move that doubles its
power if the user is poisoned,
burned, or has paralysis.

name: TM - Secret Power
description:
The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its added effects
vary depending on the user's
environment.

name: TM - Rest
description:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user's
HP and heals any status problem.

name: TM - Attract
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

name: TM - Thief
description:
An attack which steals the foe's
held item if the user isn't already
holding one. Its effects are
temporary when stealing from
Trainers.

name: TM - Steel Wing
description:
The target is hit with wings of
steel. It may also raise the user's
Defense stat.

name: TM - Skill Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to exchange Abilities with the
target.

name: TM - Snatch
description:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or stat-changing move the
opponent attempts to use.

name: TM - Overheat
description:
The user attacks the target at full
power. The attack's recoil harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: HM - Cut
description:
The target is cut with a scythe or a
claw. It can also be used to cut
down thin trees.

name: HM - Fly
description:
The user soars, then strikes its
target on the second turn. It can
also be used for flying to any
familiar town.

name: HM - Surf
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant wave. It can also be
used for crossing water.

name: HM - Strength
description:
The target is slugged with a punch
thrown at maximum power. It can
also be used to move heavy
boulders.

name: HM - Flash
description:
The user flashes a bright light that
cuts the target's accuracy. It can
also be used to illuminate caves.

name: HM - Rock Smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch that
can shatter a rock. It may also
lower the target's Defense stat.

name: HM - Waterfall
description:
The user charges at the target and
may make it flinch. It can also be
used to climb a waterfall.

name: HM - Dive
description:
Diving on the first turn, the user
floats up and attacks on the second
turn. It can be used to dive deep
in the ocean.

name: Oak'S Parcel
description:
A parcel to be delivered to PROF.
OAK from VIRIDIAN CITY's POKéMON
MART.

name: Poké Flute
description:
A flute that is said to instantly
awaken any POKéMON. It has a
lovely tone.

name: Secret Key
description:
The key to CINNABAR ISLAND GYM's
front door. It is colored red and
decorated.

name: Bike Voucher
description:
Take this voucher to the BIKE SHOP
in CERULEAN CITY and exchange it
for a bicycle.

name: Gold Teeth
description:
A set of false teeth lost by the
SAFARI ZONE'S WARDEN. It makes his
smile sparkle.

name: Old Amber
description:
A piece of amber that contains
the genes of an ancient POKéMON.
It is clear with a reddish tint.

name: Card Key
description:
A card-type key that unlocks doors
in SILPH CO.'s HEAD OFFICE in
SAFFRON CITY.

name: Lift Key
description:
A key that operates the elevator
in TEAM ROCKET's HIDEOUT.
It bears the TEAM ROCKET logo.

name: Helix Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

name: Dome Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a shell.

name: Silph Scope
description:
A scope that makes unseeable
POKéMON visible.
It is made by SILPH CO.

name: Bicycle
description:
A folding bicycle that allows
faster movement than the RUNNING
SHOES.

name: Town Map
description:
A very convenient map that can be
viewed anytime. It even shows your
present location.

name: Vs Seeker
description:
A device that indicates TRAINERS
who want to battle. The battery
charges while traveling.

name: Fame Checker
description:
A device that enables you to
recall what you've heard and seen
about famous people.

name: Tm Case
description:
A case that holds TMs and HMs.
It is attached to the BAG's
compartment for important items.

name: Berry Pouch
description:
A pouch for carrying BERRIES.
It is attached to the BAG's
compartment for important items.

name: Teachy Tv
description:
A television set that is tuned to
a program with useful tips for
novice TRAINERS.

name: Tri-pass
description:
A pass for ferries between ONE,
TWO, and THREE ISLAND.
It has a drawing of three islands.

name: Rainbow Pass
description:
A pass for ferries between
VERMILION and the SEVII ISLANDS.
It features a drawing of a rainbow.

name: Tea
description:
An aromatic tea prepared by an old
lady. It will slake even the worst
thirst.

name: Mysticticket
description:
A ticket required to board the ship
to NAVEL ROCK.
It glows with a mystic light.

name: Auroraticket
description:
A ticket required to board the ship
to BIRTH ISLAND.
It glows beautifully.

name: Powder Jar
description:
A jar for storing BERRY POWDER
made using a BERRY CRUSHER.

name: Ruby
description:
An exquisitely beautiful gem that
has a red glow.
It symbolizes passion.

name: Sapphire
description:
An exquisitely beautiful gem that
has a blue glow.
It symbolizes honesty.

name: Magma Emblem
description: Magma Emblem

name: Old Sea Map
description: Old Sea Map

name: Training Link
description:
When held by a Pokémon, it prevents
the holder from gaining any EXP, but
doubles EV gain.

The holder may gain EVs even if they
don't participate in the battle.

name: Name Change Contract
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's name.

Can only be used once.

name: Mystery Box
description:
A mysterious box which contains an
unknown reward.

Use to open.

name: Makeover Kit
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's base appearance.

Can only be used once.

name: Team Name Change Plaque
description:
An item which can be used to change
your team's name and tag.

Can only be used once.
Must be used by team leader.

name: Brace - HP
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will make the
Pokémon's Hp IV the dominant trait.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Brace - Attack
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will make the
Pokémon's Attack IV the dominant
trait.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Brace - Defense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will make the
Pokémon's Defense IV the dominant
trait.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Brace - Sp.Atk
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will make the
Pokémon's Special Attack IV the
dominant trait.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Brace - Sp.Def
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will make the
Pokémon's Special Defense IV the
dominant trait.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Brace - Speed
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will make the
Pokémon's Speed IV the dominant
trait.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Root Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

name: Claw Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a claw.

name: Old Amber
description:
A piece of amber that contains the
genetic material of an ancient
Pokémon.
It is clear with a reddish tint.

name: Helix Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

name: Dome Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a shell.

name: Ability Pill
description:
A pill that can be used to switch the
ability of a Pokémon.

Consumed on use.

name: Spooky Candy
description: A scary looking snack.

name: Goodie Bag (2015)
description:
A scary looking goodie bag which
contains an unknown reward.

May contain exclusive items for
Halloween 2015. Use to open.

name: Big Robot Part
description:
A large piece of a robot.

It's really heavy!

name: Tiny Robot Part
description: A small piece of a robot.

name: Xmas Present (2015)
description:
A fancy looking present which contains
an unknown reward.

May contain exclusive items for Xmas
2015. Use to open.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 7 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 15 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 30 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Harvesting Tool
description:
An item which can be used to extract
seeds from berries.

Consumed upon use

name: Unbreakable Harvesting Tool
description:
An item which can be used to extract
seeds from berries.

name: Plain Spicy Seed
description:
A spicy seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Spicy Seed
description:
A spicy seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Dry Seed
description:
A dry seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Dry Seed
description:
A dry seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Sweet Seed
description:
A sweet seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Sweet Seed
description:
A sweet seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Bitter Seed
description:
A bitter seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Bitter Seed
description:
A bitter seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Sour Seed
description:
A sour seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Sour Seed
description:
A sour seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Exp. Reamplifier
description:
An item which distributes EXP and EVs
among all healthy Pokémon, even if
they don't participate in battle.

25% of battle EXP gained is shared
among active Pokémon, the rest is
split between the whole party. Each
Pokémon also gains an additional +5%
of the total amount earned from the
battle.

Exp. Share effects are negated while
this item is active.

Use to activate or deactivate.

name: Lure
description:
A lure which attracts wild Pokémon for
100 steps. It has several effects
while active:

- Encounter rates increased by +10%
- Foes are slightly stronger than
normal Pokémon in the area
- You may encounter more foes at the
same time
- 5% chance to encounter lure-exclusi
ve species

Consumed upon use.

name: Super Lure
description:
A lure which attracts wild Pokémon for
200 steps. It has several effects
while active:

- Encounter rates increased by +10%
- Foes are slightly stronger than
normal Pokémon in the area
- You may encounter more foes at the
same time
- 5% chance to encounter lure-exclusi
ve species

Consumed upon use.

name: Expert Lure
description:
A lure which attracts wild Pokémon for
250 steps. It has several effects
while active:

- Encounter rates increased by +10%
- Foes are slightly stronger than
normal Pokémon in the area
- You may encounter more foes at the
same time
- 5% chance to encounter lure-exclusi
ve species

Consumed upon use.

name: Premium Lure
description:
A premium lure which attracts wild
Pokémon for 200 steps. It has several
effects while active:

- +25% encounter rates
- Foes are stronger than normal
encounters in the area
- You may encounter more foes at the
same time
- 10% chance to encounter lure-exclus
ive species
- Small hordes (3) may increase in
size
- If you encounter a Shiny Pokémon,
'Secret Shiny' rates are increased by
+25%

Consumed upon use.

name: Premium Super Lure
description:
A premium lure which attracts wild
Pokémon for 300 steps. It has several
effects while active:

- +25% encounter rates
- Foes are stronger than normal
encounters in the area
- You may encounter more foes at the
same time
- 10% chance to encounter lure-exclus
ive species
- Small hordes (3) may increase in
size
- If you encounter a Shiny Pokémon,
'Secret Shiny' rates are increased by
+25%

Consumed upon use.

name: Premium Max Lure
description:
A premium lure which attracts wild
Pokémon for 400 steps. It has several
effects while active:

- +25% encounter rates
- Foes are stronger than normal
encounters in the area
- You may encounter more foes at the
same time
- 10% chance to encounter lure-exclus
ive species
- Small hordes (3) may increase in
size
- If you encounter a Shiny Pokémon,
'Secret Shiny' rates are increased by
+25%

Consumed upon use.

name: Armor Fossil
description:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that lived on the land. It appears to
be part of a collar.

name: Skull Fossil
description:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that lived on the land. It appears to
be part of a head.

name: PVP Mystery Box (Legacy)
description:
A mysterious box which contains an
unknown reward.

Use to open.

name: Genderswap Ticket
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's gender and base
appearance.

Can only be used once.

name: RED POKéBLOCK
description: Raises the COOLNESS of a Pokémon.

name: BLUE POKéBLOCK
description: Raises the BEAUTY of a Pokémon.

name: PINK POKéBLOCK
description: Raises the CUTENESS of a Pokémon.

name: GREEN POKéBLOCK
description: Raises the SMARTNESS of a Pokémon.

name: YELLOW POKéBLOCK
description: Raises the TOUGHNESS of a Pokémon.

name: WHITE POKéBLOCK
description:
Raises all contest stats of a
Pokémon.

this item.

name: Rare Candy
description:
A candy that is packed with energy.
It raises the level of a single
Pokémon
by one.

name: Cheri Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it recovers from paralysis.

name: Chesto Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it recovers from sleep.

name: Pecha Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it recovers from poison.

name: Rawst Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it recovers from a burn.

name: Aspear Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it defrosts it.

name: Leppa Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it restores a move's PP by 10.

name: Oran Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it heals the user by just 10 HP.

name: Persim Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it recovers from confusion.

name: Lum Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon,
it recovers from any status problem.

name: Sitrus Berry
description:

Consumed upon use.
Effects last 1 hour.
Link members receive a 10% bonus.

Allows transferring the Hidden Ability

Consumed upon use.

name: Assault Gear
description:

holder's Special Defense by 50%.

It prevents the use of all Status
moves except 'Me First' in battle.

It can also be planted to grow more

Nature Herbs.

unknown reward.

May contain exclusive items for Lunar
New Year 2023.
Use to open.

name: Rainbow Quill
description:
A special feather which may be used to
alter the IVs of certain Pokémon by
1.

Consumed upon use.

name: Legendary Lure
description:
A special lure which attracts roaming
Legendary Pokémon and others for 300
steps. It has several effects while
active:

- +15% encounter rates
- +30% chance to encounter a Roaming
Legendary if not already captured
- Foes are stronger than normal
encounters in the area
- You may encounter more foes at the
same time
- 8% chance to encounter lure-exclusi
ve species

Consumed upon use.

name: Goodie Bag
description:
A scary looking goodie bag which
contains an unknown reward.

May contain exclusive items for
Halloween 2023. Use to open.

name: Pumpking Goodie Bag
description:
A scary looking goodie bag which
contains an unknown reward.

May contain exclusive items for
Halloween 2023. Use to open.

name: Mysterious Poké Ball
description:
A mysterious Poké Ball which contains
an unknown reward. It has a high base
chance to contain a Shiny Pokémon
(1/8,000).

Exclusive to Xmas 2023.

name: Mysterious Great Ball
description:
A mysterious Great Ball which contains
an unknown reward. It has a very high
base chance to contain a Shiny
Pokémon (1/4,000).

Exclusive to Xmas 2023.

name: Mysterious Ultra Ball
description:
A mysterious Ultra Ball which contains
an unknown reward. It has an
exceptionally high base chance to
contain a Shiny Pokémon (1/2,500).

Exclusive to Xmas 2023.

name: Mysterious Premier Ball
description:
A mysterious Premier Ball which
contains an unknown reward. It has a
very high base chance to contain a
Shiny Pokémon (1/4,000).

Exclusive to Xmas 2023.

name: Elemental Orb
description:
A special orb which may be used to
alter the IVs of certain Pokémon by
1.

Consumed upon use.

name: Wishing Stone
description:
A mysterious stone which doesn't seem
to have a use right now. Better hang
on to it.

name: Transformation Potion (Elfbot)
description:
A mysterious potion which transforms
the user's appearance.

Consumed upon use.
Effects last for 1 hour.

name: Infinite Transformation Potion (Elfbot)
description:
A mysterious potion which transforms
the user's appearance.

Unlimited uses.
Effects last for 1 hour.

name: Transformation Potion (Robosanta)
description:

the user's appearance.

Consumed upon use.

name: Elfbot Mastery Device (Red)
description:
Upgrades your Elfbot's Attack,
Sp.Attack, and Speed IVs by +4.
Consumed upon use.

name: Elfbot Mastery Device (Blue)
description:
Upgrades your Elfbot's HP, Defense,
and Sp.Defense IVs by +4.
Consumed upon use.

name: ElfUp™ Battle Mastery DriveⓇ (v2.1.1)
description:
A powerful upgrade component for your
Elfbot.

When held, it reduces incoming damage
by 30%, while increasing damage
output by 30%.

name: ElfUp: Gold Edition™
description:
Raises your current Elfbot's Level by
5.

Consumed upon use.

name: Attribute Recombinator
description:
Allows you to adjust your elfbot's EVs
& Nature.

Consumed upon use.

name: Energy Elixir
description:
Raises the selected Pokémon's level by
3.

Consumed upon use.

name: Lost Present
description:
A fancy looking present.

Santa's looking for these.
Can be exchanged in bundles of 5.

name: Lost Big Present
description:
A big, fancy looking present.

Santa's looking for these.
Can be exchanged in bundles of 5.

name: TM - Focus Punch
description:
The user focuses its mind before
launching a punch. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.

name: TM - Water Pulse
description:
The user attacks the target with a
pulsing blast of water. It may also
confuse the target.

name: TM - Bullet Seed
description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the target. Two to five seeds are
shot in rapid succession.

name: TM - Giga Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's HP is restored by half the
damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Iron Tail
description:
The target is slammed with a
steel-hard tail. It may also lower
the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Shock Wave
description:
The user strikes the target with a
quick jolt of electricity. This
attack cannot be evaded.

name: TM - Secret Power
description:
The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its added effects
vary depending on the user's
environment.

name: TM - Steel Wing
description:
The target is hit with wings of
steel. It may also raise the user's
Defense stat.

name: TM - Skill Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to exchange Abilities with the
target.

name: TM - Snatch
description:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or stat-changing move the
opponent attempts to use.

name: TM - Roost
description:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user's HP by up to
half of its max HP.

name: TM - Brine
description:
If the target's HP is down to about
half, this attack will hit with
double the power.

name: TM - Endure
description:
The user endures any attack with at
least 1 HP. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Dragon Pulse
description:
The target is attacked with a shock
wave generated by the user's gaping
mouth.

name: TM - Drain Punch
description:
An energy-draining punch. The user's
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

name: TM - Silver Wind
description:
The target is attacked with powdery
scales blown by wind. It may also
raise all the user's stats.

name: TM - Recycle
description:
The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can
be used again.

name: TM - Avalanche
description:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the target in the same
turn.

name: TM - Stealth Rock
description:
The user lays a trap of levitating
stones around the opponent's team.
The trap hurts opponents that
switch into battle.

name: TM - Captivate
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target is charmed into
harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Dark Pulse
description:
The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. It may
also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Sleep Talk
description:
While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves it
knows.

name: TM - Natural Gift
description:
The user draws power to attack by
using its held Berry. The Berry
determines its type and power.

name: TM - Leech Life
description:
The user drains the target's blood.
The user's HP is restored by half
the damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Nature Power
description:
An attack that makes use of nature's
power. Its effects vary depending
on the user's environment.

name: TM - Air Slash
description:
The user attacks with a blade of air
that slices even the sky. It may
also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Bug Buzz
description:
The user vibrates its wings to
generate a damaging sound wave. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Power Gem
description:
The user attacks with a ray of light
that sparkles as if it were made of
gemstones.

name: TM - Razor Wind
description:
A two-turn attack. Blades of wind
hit opposing Pokémon on the second
turn. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Brave Bird
description:
The user tucks in its wings and
charges from a low altitude. The
user also takes serious damage.

name: TM - Whirlwind
description:
The target is blown away, to be
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Nasty Plot
description:
The user stimulates its brain by
thinking bad thoughts. It sharply
raises the user's Sp. Atk.

name: TM - Thunder Fang
description:
The user bites with electrified
fangs. It may also make the target
flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: TM - Ice Fang
description:
The user bites with cold-infused
fangs. It may also make the target
flinch or leave it frozen.

name: TM - Fire Fang
description:
The user bites with flame-cloaked
fangs. It may also make the target
flinch or leave it burned.

name: TM - Psycho Cut
description:
The user tears at the target with
blades formed by psychic power.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Horn Drill
description:
The user stabs the target with a
horn that rotates like a drill. If
it hits, the target faints
instantly.

name: TM - Take Down
description:
A reckless, full-body charge attack
for slamming into the target. It
also damages the user a little.

name: TM - Leaf Storm
description:
The user whips up a storm of leaves
around the target. The attack's
recoil harshly reduces the user's
Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Power Whip
description:
The user violently whirls its vines
or tentacles to harshly lash the
target.

name: TM - Pin Missile
description:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target
in rapid succession. They hit two
to five times in a row.

name: TM - Cross Poison
description:
A slashing attack with a poisonous
blade that may also leave the
target poisoned. Critical hits land
more easily.

name: TM - Water Gun
description:
The target is blasted with a
forceful shot of water.

name: TM - Hydro Pump
description:
The target is blasted by a huge
volume of water launched under
great pressure.

name: TM - BubbleBeam
description:
A spray of bubbles is forcefully
ejected at the opposing team. It
may also lower their Speed stats.

name: TM - Submission
description:
The user grabs the target and
recklessly dives for the ground. It
also hurts the user slightly.

name: TM - Mega Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's HP is restored by half the
damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Dragon Rage
description:
This attack hits the target with a
shock wave of pure rage. This
attack always inflicts 40 HP
damage.

name: TM - Fire Spin
description:
The target becomes trapped within a
fierce vortex of fire that rages
for four to five turns.

name: TM - Heavy Slam
description:
The user slams into the target with
its heavy body. The more the user
outweighs the target, the greater
its damage.

name: TM - Electro Ball
description:
The user hurls an electric orb at
the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the
damage.

name: TM - Fissure
description:
The user opens up a fissure in the
ground and drops the target in. The
target instantly faints if it
hits.

name: TM - Agility
description:
The user relaxes and lightens its
body to move faster. It sharply
boosts the Speed stat.

name: TM - Rage
description:
As long as this move is in use, the
power of rage raises the Attack
stat each time the user is hit in
battle.

name: TM - Teleport
description:
When used by a Trainer, it switches
the user out no matter what. Wild
Pokémon may flee instantly. When
used out of battle, it will warp
you to the last Pokémon Center.

name: TM - Stored Power
description:
The user attacks the target with
stored power. The more the user's
stats are raised, the greater the
damage.

name: TM - Hex
description:
This relentless attack does massive
damage to a target affected by
status problems.

name: TM - Focus Energy
description:
The user takes a deep breath and
focuses so that critical hits land
more easily.

name: TM - Bide
description:
The user endures attacks for two
turns, then strikes back to cause
double the damage taken.

name: TM - Egg Bomb
description:
A large egg is hurled at the target
with maximum force to inflict
damage.

name: TM - Skull Bash
description:
The user tucks in its head to raise
its Defense in the first turn, then
rams the target on the next turn.

name: TM - Amnesia
description:
The user temporarily empties its
mind to forget its concerns. It
sharply raises the user's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Razor Shell
description:
The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower
the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Heat Crash
description:
The user slams its target with its
flame- covered body. The more the
user outweighs the target, the
greater the damage.

name: TM - Tail Slap
description:
The user attacks by striking the
target with its hard tail. It hits
the target two to five times in a
row.

name: TM - Hurricane
description:
The user attacks by wrapping its
opponent in a fierce wind that
flies up into the sky. It may also
confuse the target.

name: TM - Psywave
description:
The target is attacked with an odd
psychic wave. The attack varies in
intensity.

name: TM - Tri Attack
description:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn,
freeze, or leave the target with
paralysis.

name: TM - Curse
description:
A move which functions differently
depending on the type of its user.
When used by a Ghost, the target
loses 1/4 of their maximum HP every
turn, but the user immediately
loses half of theirs. For other
types, it will reduce Speed while
increasing Attack & Defense by 1
stage.

name: TM - Reversal
description:
An all-out attack that becomes more
powerful the less HP the user has.

name: TM - Scary Face
description:
The user frightens the target with a
scary face to harshly reduce its
Speed stat.

name: TM - Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of spikes at
the opposing team's feet. The trap
hurts Pokémon that switch into
battle.

name: TM - Zap Cannon
description:
The user fires an electric blast
like a cannon to inflict damage and
cause paralysis.

name: TM - Detect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Charm
description:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target's Attack is harshly
lowered.

name: TM - Megahorn
description:
Using its tough and impressive horn,
the user rams into the target with
no letup.

name: TM - DragonBreath
description:
The user exhales a mighty gust that
inflicts damage. It may also leave
the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Baton Pass
description:
The user switches places with a
Pokémon in your party, passing
along some effects. Will not pass
stat changes or status ailments.

name: TM - Encore
description:
The user compels the target to keep
using only the move it last used
for three turns.

name: TM - Sweet Scent
description:
Expels a sweet scent which lowers
the foe's Evasion. It lures hordes
of Pokémon when used in areas which
have wild encounters, but requires
more PP.

name: TM - Crunch
description:
Crunches the foe with its sharp
teeth. It may lower their Defense
stat.

name: TM - Future Sight
description:
Two turns after this move is used, a
hunk of psychic energy attacks the
target.

name: TM - Whirlpool
description:
Traps foes in a violent swirling
whirlpool for four to five turns.

name: TM - Beat Up
description:
The user gets all party Pokémon to
attack the target. The more party
Pokémon, the greater the number of
attacks.

name: TM - Revenge
description:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the opponent in the same
turn.

name: TM - Imprison
description:
If the opponents know any move also
known by the user, the opponents
are prevented from using it.

name: TM - Screech
description:
An earsplitting screech harshly
reduces the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Blaze Kick
description:
The user launches a kick that lands
a critical hit more easily. It may
also leave the target with a burn.

name: TM - Weather Ball
description:
An attack move that varies in power
and type depending on the weather.

name: TM - Fake Tears
description:
The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Cosmic Power
description:
The user absorbs a mystical power
from space to raise its Defense and
Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Sand Tomb
description:
The user traps the target inside a
harshly raging sandstorm for four
to five turns.

name: TM - Muddy Water
description:
The user attacks by shooting muddy
water at the opposing team. It may
also lower the targets' accuracy.

name: TM - Icicle Spear
description:
The user launches sharp icicles at
the target. It strikes two to five
times in a row.

name: TM - Mud Shot
description:
The user attacks by hurling a blob
of mud at the target. It also
reduces the target's Speed.

name: TM - Magical Leaf
description:
The user scatters curious leaves
that chase the target. This attack
will not miss.

name: TM - Leaf Blade
description:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a
sword and attacks by cutting its
target. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Dragon Dance
description:
The user vigorously performs a
mystic, powerful dance that boosts
its Attack and Speed stats.

name: TM - Rock Blast
description:
The user hurls hard rocks at the
target. Two to five rocks are
launched in quick succession.

name: TM - Close Combat
description:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. It also
cuts the user's Defense and Sp.
Def.

name: TM - Assurance
description:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this
attack's power is doubled.

name: TM - Power Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Attack and
Sp. Atk with the target.

name: TM - Guard Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Defense
and Sp. Def with the target.

name: TM - Pay Day
description:
Throws coins at the foe which are
recovered after the battle. The
amount of coins increases with the
foe's level. It's only effective
once per battle.

name: TM - Toxic Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of poison
spikes at the opponent's feet. They
poison opponents that switch into
battle.

name: TM - Flare Blitz
description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and
charges at the target. The user
sustains serious damage and may
leave the target burned.

name: TM - Aura Sphere
description:
The user looses a blast of aura
power from deep within its body at
the target. This move is certain to
hit.

name: TM - Counter
description:
A retaliation move that counters any
physical attack, inflicting double
the damage taken.

name: TM - Metronome
description:
The user waggles a finger and
stimulates its brain into randomly
using nearly any move.

name: TM - Mega Kick
description:
The target is attacked by a kick
launched with muscle-packed power.

name: TM - Mega Punch
description:
The target is slugged by a punch
thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: TM - Double-Edge
description:
A reckless, life-risking tackle. It
also damages the user by a fairly
large amount, however.

name: TM - Body Slam
description:
The user drops onto the target with
its full body weight. It may also
leave the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Softboiled
description:
Heals the user by half of its max
HP.

name: TM - Rollout
description:
The user continually rolls into the
target over five turns. It becomes
stronger each time it hits.

name: TM - DynamicPunch
description:
The user punches the target with
full, concentrated power. It
confuses the target if it hits.

name: TM - Mimic
description:
The user copies the target's last
move. The move can be used during
battle until the Pokémon is
switched out.

name: TM - Fury Cutter
description:
The target is slashed with scythes
or claws. Its power increases if it
hits in succession.

name: TM - Seismic Toss
description:
The target is thrown using the power
of gravity. It inflicts damage
equal to the user's level.

name: TM - Mud-Slap
description:
The user hurls mud in the target's
face to inflict damage and lower
its accuracy.

name: TM - Psybeam
description:
The target is attacked with a
peculiar ray. It may also cause
confusion.

name: TM - Confuse Ray
description:
The target is exposed to a sinister
ray that triggers confusion.

name: TM - Poison Tail
description:
The user hits the target with its
tail. It may also poison the
target. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Metal Claw
description:
The target is raked with steel
claws. It may also raise the user's
Attack stat.

name: TM - Swift
description:
Star-shaped rays are shot at the
opposing team. This attack never
misses.

name: TM - Icy Wind
description:
The user attacks with a gust of
chilled air. It also reduces the
targets' Speed stat.

name: TM - Air Cutter
description:
The user launches razor-like wind to
slash the opposing team. Critical
hits land more easily.

name: TM - Night Shade
description:
The user makes the target see a
frightening mirage. It inflicts
damage matching the user's level.

name: TM - Foul Play
description:
The user turns the target's power
against it. The higher the target's
Attack stat, the greater the
damage.

name: TM - Seed Bomb
description:
The user slams a barrage of
hard-shelled seeds down on the
target from above.

name: TM - Iron Head
description:
The user slams the target with its
steel-hard head. It may also make
the target flinch.

name: TM - Gunk Shot
description:
The user shoots filthy garbage at
the target to attack. It may also
poison the target.

name: TM - Iron Defense
description:
The user hardens its body's surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.

name: TM - Drill Run
description:
The user crashes into its target
while rotating its body like a
drill. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Trick
description:
The user catches the target off
guard and swaps its held item with
its own.

name: TM - Tailwind
description:
The user whips up a turbulent
whirlwind that ups the Speed of all
party Pokémon for four turns.

name: TM - Hyper Voice
description:
The user lets loose a horribly
echoing shout with the power to
inflict damage.

name: TM - Heat Wave
description:
The user attacks by exhaling hot
breath on the opposing team. It may
also leave targets with a burn.

name: TM - Earth Power
description:
The user makes the ground under the
target erupt with power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - Outrage
description:
The user rampages and attacks for
two to three turns. It then becomes
confused, however.

name: TM - Draco Meteor
description:
Comets are summoned down from the
sky onto the target. The attack's
recoil harshly reduces the user's
Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Fire Punch
description:
The target is punched with a fiery
fist. It may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: TM - Ice Punch
description:
The target is punched with an icy
fist. It may also leave the target
frozen.

name: TM - ThunderPunch
description:
The target is punched with an
electrified fist. It may also leave
the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Zen Headbutt
description:
The user focuses its willpower to
its head and attacks the target. It
may also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Helping Hand
description:
The user assists an ally by boosting
the power of its attack.

name: TM - Low Kick
description:
A powerful low kick that makes the
target fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on heavier targets.

name: TM - Acid Spray
description:
The user spits fluid that works to
melt the target. This harshly
reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Headbutt
description:
The user sticks out its head and
attacks by charging straight into
the target. It may also make the
target flinch.

name: TM - Selfdestruct
description:
The user attacks everything around
it by causing an explosion. The
user faints upon using this move.

name: TM - Superpower
description:
The user attacks the target with
great power. However, it also
lowers the user's Attack and
Defense.

name: TM - Charge
description:
The user charges up, doubling the
power of the next Electric-type
move. It also raises the Sp. Def of
the user by 1 stage.

name: TM - Haze
description:
The user creates a haze that
eliminates every stat change among
all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: TM - Spite
description:
The user unleashes its grudge on the
move last used by the target by
cutting 4 PP from it.

name: TM - Gravity
description:
Gravity is intensified for five
turns, making moves involving
flying unusable and negating
Levitate.

name: TM - Knock Off
description:
The user slaps down the target's
held item, preventing that item
from being used in the battle.

name: TM - Bug Bite
description:
The user bites the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.

name: TM - Super Fang
description:
The user chomps hard on the target
with its sharp front fangs. It cuts
the target's HP to half.

name: TM - Vacuum Wave
description:
The user whirls its fists to send a
wave of pure vacuum at the target.
This move always goes first.

name: TM - Uproar
description:
The user attacks in an uproar for
three turns. Over that time, no one
can fall asleep.

name: Master Ball
description:
The best Ball with the ultimate level
of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

name: Ultra Ball
description:
An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.

name: Great Ball
description:
A good, high-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a standard Poké Ball.

name: Poké Ball
description:
A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the
target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

name: Safari Ball
description:
A special Poké Ball that is used only
in
the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a
camouflage pattern.

name: Net Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

name: Dive Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball which
works especially well on Pokémon that
are encountered in water.

name: Nest Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on weaker
Pokémon in the wild.

name: Repeat Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which grows in strength
every consecutive capture of a
species of Pokémon. It powers up even
when using a different type of Poké
Ball. Its power is reset to 1.0x if
you capture something else, or if you
don't capture anything for a few
days.

name: Timer Ball
description:
A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

name: Luxury Ball
description:
A luxurious Poké Ball which helps grow
your friendship with a Pokémon
quickly. It works well on Pokémon
which evolve due to happiness.

name: Premier Ball
description:
A somewhat rare Poké Ball that has
been specially made to commemorate
an event of some sort.

name: Dusk Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like
caves.

name: Heal Ball
description:
A remedial Poké Ball that restores
the
caught Pokémon's HP and eliminates
any status problem.

name: Quick Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild
encounter.

name: Cherish Ball
description:
A quite rare Poké Ball that has been
specially crafted to commemorate
an occasion of some sort.

name: Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

name: Antidote
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It lifts the effect of poison from
one
Pokémon.

name: Burn Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals a single Pokémon that is
suffering from a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.
