name: Mystic Water
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: Sharp Beak
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Flying-type
moves by 20%..

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: Poison Barb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Poison-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: NeverMeltIce
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Ice-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: Spell Tag
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Ghost-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: TwistedSpoon
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Psychic-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: Charcoal
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Fire-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: Dragon Fang
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Dragon-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: Silk Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Normal-type
moves by 20%.

It is popular among certain Move
Tutors.

name: Up-Grade
description:
A transparent device filled with all
sorts of data.
It was produced by Silph Co.

name: Shell Bell
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It restores HP to the holder equal to
12.5% of damage inflicted by a move.

The effects of this item can be
nullified by the Heal Block ability.

name: Sea Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Marill or Azumarill while
breeding, it may help them produce a
Azurill egg.

name: Lax Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It slightly reduces the foe's
Accuracy.

If held by a Wobbuffet while breeding,
it may help them produce a Wynaut
egg.

name: Lucky Punch
description:
An item to be held by Chansey. It is
a
pair of gloves that boosts Chansey's
critical-hit ratio.

name: Metal Powder
description:
An item to be held by Ditto.
Extremely fine yet hard, this odd
powder boosts the Defense stat.

name: Thick Club
description:
An item to be held by Cubone or
Marowak. It is a hard bone of some
sort that boosts the Attack stat.

name: Stick
description:
An item to be held by Farfetch'd. It
is
a very long and stiff stalk of leek
that boosts the critical-hit ratio.

name: Red Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cool aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Blue Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Beauty aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Pink Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cute aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Green Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Smart aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Yellow Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Tough aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Wide Lens
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a magnifying lens that slightly
boosts the accuracy of moves.

name: Muscle Band
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the power of Physical moves
by 10%.

name: Wise Glasses
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It
is
a thick pair of glasses that slightly
boosts the power of special moves.

name: Expert Belt
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the power of Super Effective
moves by 20%.

name: Light Clay
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder uses the moves Light
Screen or Reflect, their effects will
be increased from 5 to 8 turns.

name: Life Orb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase the
power of moves by 30% when in battle,
but at the cost of 10% of the
attacker's Maximum HP per-turn.

name: Power Herb
description:
A single-use item to be held by a
Pokémon. It allows the immediate use
of
a move that charges on the first
turn.

name: Toxic Orb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a bizarre orb that badly
poisons
the holder in battle.

name: Flame Orb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a
burn on the holder in battle.

name: Quick Powder
description:
An item to be held by Ditto.
Extremely fine yet hard, this odd
powder boosts the Speed stat.

name: Focus Sash
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If it has full HP, The holder will
endure a potential KO attack with
1HP.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Zoom Lens
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after its
target, its accuracy will be boosted.

name: Metronome
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the power of a move by 20%
for each consecutive use, up to a
maximum increase of 100%.

name: Iron Ball
description:
A Pokémon held item that cuts Speed.
It makes Flying-type and levitating
holders susceptible to Ground moves.

name: Lagging Tail
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is tremendously heavy and makes
the holder move slower than usual.

name: Destiny Knot
description:
A long, thin, bright-red string to
be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

name: Black Sludge
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
When held by a Poison-type Pokémon in
battle, 6.25% of the holder's HP is
restored at the end of each turn.

When held by a Non-Poison-type
Pokémon, it inflicts 12.5% of damage
at the end of each turn. Pokémon with
the ability Magic Guard are immune to
this effect.

name: Icy Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Snowy
weather to 8 turns, when created by
the item holder.

name: Smooth Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Sandstorm
weather to 8 turns, when created by
the item holder.

name: Heat Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Harsh
Sunlight weather to 8 turns, when
created by the item holder.

name: Damp Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Rain
weather to 8 turns, when created by
the item holder.

name: Grip Claw
description:
When held by a Pokémon, it causes
binding moves used by the holder to
always continue for 7 turns.

name: Choice Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase Speed
by 50% when in battle, but only
allows the use of the first move
selected.

name: Sticky Barb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It inflicts the holder with 12.5% of
its maximum HP each turn.

If the holder is hit with a move that
makes contact, the Sticky Barb will
latch onto the opponent.

Pokémon with the ability Magic Guard
do not take damage from this item.

name: Power Bracer
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Attack
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Belt
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Defense
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Lens
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Sp.Atk
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Band
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Sp.Def
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Anklet
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Speed
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Weight
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's HP IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Shed Shell
description:
A tough, discarded carapace to be
held
by a Pokémon. It enables the holder
to
switch with a waiting Pokémon in
battle.

name: Big Root
description:
A Pokémon held item that boosts the
power of HP-stealing moves to let the
holder recover more HP.

name: Choice Specs
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase Sp.Atk
by 50% when in battle, but only
allows the use of the first move
selected.

name: Flame Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fire-type moves.

name: Splash Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Water-type moves.

name: Zap Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Electric-type moves.

name: Meadow Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Grass-type moves.

name: Icicle Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Ice-type moves.

name: Fist Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fighting-type moves.

name: Toxic Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Poison-type moves.

name: Earth Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Ground-type moves.

name: Sky Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Flying-type moves.

name: Mind Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Psychic-type moves.

name: Insect Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Bug-type moves.

name: Stone Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Rock-type moves.

name: Spooky Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Ghost-type moves.

name: Draco Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Dragon-type moves.

name: Dread Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Dark-type moves.

name: Iron Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Steel-type moves.

name: Odd Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Psychic-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Mr. Mime while breeding,
it may help them produce a Mime Jr.
egg.

name: Rock Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Rock-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Sudowoodo while breeding,
it may help them produce a Bonsly
egg.

name: Full Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
it causes the Pokémon to move last
when using a move of the same
priority as the opponent.

If held by a Snorlax while breeding,
it may help them produce a Munchlax
egg.

name: Wave Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Mantine while breeding,
it may help them produce a Mantyke
egg.

name: Rose Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Grass-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Roselia or Roserade while
breeding, it may help them produce a
Budew egg.

name: Luck Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If held by a Chansey while breeding,
it may help them produce a Happiny
egg.

name: Pure Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It slightly reduces the chance of
encountering wild Pokémon.

If held by a Chimecho while breeding,
it may help them produce a Chingling
egg.

name: Protector
description:
A protective item of some sort.
It is extremely stiff and heavy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Electirizer
description:
A box packed with a tremendous
amount of electric energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Magmarizer
description:
A box packed with a tremendous
amount of magma energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Dubious Disc
description:
A transparent device overflowing with
dubious data.
Its producer is unknown.

name: Reaper Cloth
description:
A cloth imbued with horrifyingly
strong
spiritual energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Razor Claw
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a sharply hooked claw that ups
the holder's critical-hit ratio.

name: Razor Fang
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may make foes and allies flinch
when the holder inflicts damage.

name: TM - Hone Claws
description:
The user sharpens its claws to boost
its Attack stat and accuracy.

name: TM - Dragon Claw
description:
The user slashes the target with
huge, sharp claws.

name: TM - Psyshock
description:
The user materializes an odd psychic
wave to attack the target. This
attack does physical damage.

name: TM - Calm Mind
description:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and calms its spirit to raise its
Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Roar
description:
The target is scared off and
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Toxic
description:
A move that leaves the target badly
poisoned. Its poison damage worsens
every turn.

name: TM - Snowscape
description:
A snowstorm forms on the field for 5
turns. Snow boosts the Defense stat
of Ice-types by 50%.

name: TM - Bulk Up
description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up its body, boosting both its
Attack and Defense stats.

name: TM - Venoshock
description:
The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is
poisoned.

name: TM - Hidden Power
description:
An attack which varies in type
depending on its user. Its type may
be changed with 40 Gems.

name: TM - Sunny Day
description:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up Fire-type
moves.

name: TM - Taunt
description:
The target is taunted into a rage
that allows it to use only attack
moves for three turns.

name: TM - Ice Beam
description:
The target is struck with an
icy-cold beam of energy. It may
also freeze the target solid.

name: TM - Blizzard
description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the opposing team. It may
also freeze them solid.

name: TM - Hyper Beam
description:
The target is attacked with a
powerful beam. The user must rest
on the next turn to regain its
energy.

name: TM - Light Screen
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from special
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Protect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Rain Dance
description:
The user summons a heavy rain that
falls for five turns, powering up
Water-type moves.

name: TM - Telekinesis
description:
The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is
easier to hit for three turns.

name: TM - Safeguard
description:
The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems for
five turns.

name: TM - Frustration
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - SolarBeam
description:
A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam
on the second turn.

name: TM - Smack Down
description:
The user throws a stone or
projectile to attack an opponent. A
flying Pokémon will fall to the
ground when hit.

name: TM - Thunderbolt
description:
A strong electric blast is loosed at
the target. It may also leave the
target with paralysis.

name: TM - Thunder
description:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on
the target to inflict damage. It
may also leave the target with
paralysis.

name: TM - Earthquake
description:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes those around it.

name: TM - Return
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - Dig
description:
The user burrows, then attacks on
the second turn. It can also be
used to exit dungeons.

name: TM - Psychic
description:
The target is hit by a strong
telekinetic force. It may also
reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Shadow Ball
description:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the
target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Brick Break
description:
The user attacks with a swift chop.
It can also break any barrier such
as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: TM - Double Team
description:
By moving rapidly, the user makes
illusory copies of itself to raise
its evasiveness.

name: TM - Reflect
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from physical
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Sludge Wave
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant sludge wave. It may
also poison those hit.

name: TM - Flamethrower
description:
The target is scorched with an
intense blast of fire. It may also
leave the target with a burn.

name: TM - Sludge Bomb
description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target. It may also poison the
target.

name: TM - Sandstorm
description:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to
hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

name: TM - Fire Blast
description:
The target is attacked with an
intense blast of all-consuming
fire. It may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: TM - Rock Tomb
description:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
It also lowers the target's Speed
by preventing its movement.

name: TM - Aerial Ace
description:
The user confounds the target with
speed, then slashes. The attack
lands without fail.

name: TM - Torment
description:
The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of
using the same move twice in a
row.

name: TM - Facade
description:
An attack move that doubles its
power if the user is poisoned,
burned, or has paralysis.

name: TM - Flame Charge
description:
The user cloaks itself with flame
and attacks. Building up more
power, it raises the user's Speed
stat.

name: TM - Rest
description:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user's
HP and heals any status problem.

name: TM - Attract
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

name: TM - Thief
description:
An attack which steals the foe's
held item if the user isn't already
holding one. Its effects are
temporary when stealing from
Trainers.

name: TM - Low Sweep
description:
The user attacks the target's legs
swiftly, reducing the target's
Speed stat.

name: TM - Round
description:
The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round
and make the attack do greater
damage.

name: TM - Echoed Voice
description:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater
damage.

name: TM - Overheat
description:
The user attacks the target at full
power. The attack's recoil harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Ally Switch
description:
The user teleports, switching places
with its adjacent ally. It may fail
if used consecutively.

name: TM - Focus Blast
description:
The user heightens its mental focus
and unleashes its power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - Energy Ball
description:
The user draws power from nature and
fires it at the target. It may also
lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - False Swipe
description:
A restrained attack that prevents
the target from fainting. The
target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: TM - Scald
description:
The user shoots boiling hot water at
its target. It may also leave the
target with a burn.

name: TM - Fling
description:
The user flings its item at the foe,
destroying it. In PvP, only
consumable items are destroyed
permanently. The move's power and
effects vary depending on what item
is thrown.

name: TM - Charge Beam
description:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any
remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Sky Drop
description:
The user takes the target into the
sky, then drops it during the next
turn. The target cannot attack
while in the sky.

name: TM - Incinerate
description:
The user attacks the target with
fire. If the target is holding a
Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up
and unusable.

name: TM - Quash
description:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.

name: TM - Will-O-Wisp
description:
The user shoots a sinister,
bluish-white flame at the target to
inflict a burn.

name: TM - Acrobatics
description:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive
damage.

name: TM - Embargo
description:
It prevents the target from using
its held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.

name: TM - Explosion
description:
The user explodes to inflict damage
on those around it. The user faints
upon using this move.

name: TM - Shadow Claw
description:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made from shadows. Critical hits
land more easily.

name: TM - Payback
description:
If the user moves after the target,
this attack's power will be
doubled.

name: TM - Retaliate
description:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally. If an ally fainted in the
previous turn, this attack's damage
increases.

name: TM - Giga Impact
description:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power. The user
must rest on the next turn.

name: TM - Rock Polish
description:
The user polishes its body to reduce
drag. It can sharply raise the
Speed stat.

name: TM - Flash
description:
The user flashes a bright light that
cuts the target's accuracy. It can
also be used to illuminate caves.

name: TM - Stone Edge
description:
The user stabs the foe with
sharpened stones from below. It has
a high critical-hit ratio.

name: TM - Volt Switch
description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

name: TM - Thunder Wave
description:
A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.

name: TM - Gyro Ball
description:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swords Dance
description:
A frenetic dance to uplift the
fighting spirit. It sharply raises
the user's Attack stat.

name: TM - Struggle Bug
description:
While resisting, the user attacks
the opposing Pokémon. The targets'
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name: TM - Psych Up
description:
The user hypnotizes itself into
copying any stat change made by the
target.

name: TM - Bulldoze
description:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is
reduced.

name: TM - Frost Breath
description:
The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results
in a critical hit.

name: TM - Rock Slide
description:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. It
may also make the targets flinch.

name: TM - X-Scissor
description:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

name: TM - Dragon Tail
description:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Work Up
description:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: TM - Poison Jab
description:
The target is stabbed with a
tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
It may also poison the target.

name: TM - Dream Eater
description:
The user eats the dreams of a
sleeping target. It absorbs half
the damage caused to heal the
user's HP.

name: TM - Grass Knot
description:
The user snares the target with
grass and trips it. The heavier the
target, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swagger
description:
The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, it also sharply
raises the target's Attack stat.

name: TM - Pluck
description:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.

name: TM - U-turn
description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

name: TM - Substitute
description:
The user makes a copy of itself
using some of its HP. The copy
serves as the user's decoy.

name: TM - Flash Cannon
description:
The user gathers all its light
energy and releases it at once. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Trick Room
description:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which slower Pokémon get to move
first for five turns.

name: HM - Cut
description:
The target is cut with a scythe or a
claw. It can also be used to cut
down thin trees.

name: HM - Fly
description:
The user soars, then strikes its
target on the second turn. It can
also be used for flying to any
familiar town.

name: HM - Surf
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant wave. It can also be
used for crossing water.

name: HM - Strength
description:
The target is slugged with a punch
thrown at maximum power. It can
also be used to move heavy
boulders.

name: HM - Waterfall
description:
The user charges at the target and
may make it flinch. It can also be
used to climb a waterfall.

name: HM - Dive
description:
Diving on the first turn, the user
floats up and attacks on the second
turn. It can be used to dive deep
in the ocean.

name: Explorer Kit
description:
A bag filled with convenient tools
for exploring. It provides access to
the Underground.

name: Loot Sack
description:
A sturdy, spacious bag that is used
to carry loot obtained in the coal
mine.

name: Rule Book
description:
It lists the rules for holding
battles.
For linked battles, you may choose
which set of rules you wish to use.

name: Poké Radar
description:
A tool that can search out Pokémon
that are hiding in grass. Its battery
is
recharged as you walk.

name: Point Card
description:
A card that lists the Battle Points
you have earned.

name: Journal
description:
A notebook that keeps a day-to-day
record of your adventure so far.

name: Seal Case
description:
A case for storing Seals that can be
applied to the Capsule cases of
Poké Balls.

name: Fashion Case
description:
A lovely case to store colorful Props
for your Pokémon to wear in a
musical.

name: Seal Bag
description:
A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals
for
decorating Poké Balls.

name: Pal Pad
description:
A convenient notepad that is used for
registering your friends, Friend
Codes,
and keeping a record of game play.

name: Works Key
description:
A large key for operating the doors
of
the Valley Windworks in the canyon.
It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

name: Old Charm
description:
An ancient good-luck charm made of
Pokémon bones to be taken to the
elder
of Celestic Town.

name: Galactic Key
description:
A card key for disengaging security
systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it
can result in punishment, apparently.

name: Red Chain
description:
A mythical chain that is said to link
the legendary Pokémon that created
the Sinnoh region.

name: Town Map
description:
A very convenient map that can be
viewed anytime. It even shows your
present location.

name: Vs. Seeker
description:
A device that indicates Trainers who
want to battle. Its battery charges
while you walk.

name: Coin Case
description:
A case for holding coins obtained at
the Game Corner.
It holds up to 50,000 coins.

name: Old Rod
description:
An old and beat-up fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Good Rod
description:
A new, good-quality fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
description:
An awesome, high-tech fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Sprayduck
description:
A watering can shaped like a Psyduck.
It helps promote healthy growth of
Berries planted in soft soil.

name: Poffin Case
description:
A case for storing Poffin cooked from
Berries.

name: Bicycle
description:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

name: Suite Key
description:
A key to one of the suites at the
luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd
reason, it often disappears.

name: Oak's Letter
description:
A letter from Prof. Oak.
Written in it is a request for you to
go to Rt. 224.

name: Lunar Wing
description:
A feather that glows like the moon.
It is said to possess the power to
dispel nightmares.

name: Member Card
description:
A card needed for entering the inn in
Canalave City. Oddly, the last date
marked on it was 50 years ago.

name: Azure Flute
description:
A flute that puts out echoing sounds
that do not seem to be of this world.
It is unknown who made it.

name: S.S. Ticket
description:
The ticket required for sailing on
the
ferry S.S. Aqua. It has a drawing of
a
ship on it.

name: Contest Pass
description:
The pass required for entering
Pokémon
Contests. It has a drawing of an
award
ribbon on it.

name: Magma Stone
description:
A stone formed when boulders melted
in
intensely hot magma, then hardened.
Magma remains sealed inside.

name: Parcel
description:
A parcel entrusted in your care.
You are supposed to deliver it to
your
childhood friend who left Twinleaf
Town.

name: Coupon 1
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 2
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 3
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Storage Key
description:
The key to Team Galactic's sinister
warehouse located at the edge of
Veilstone City.

name: SecretPotion
description:
A fantastic medicine dispensed by the
pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully
heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

name: Vs. Recorder
description:
An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.

name: Gracidea
description:
A flower sometimes bundled in
bouquets
to convey gratitude on special
occasions like birthdays.

name: Secret Key
description:
A high-tech key that has to be used
at
a specific location. It emits a
special
electric signal to open a door.

name: Apricorn Box
description:
A handy box where you can store up to
99 Apricorns of each kind.

name: Unown Report
description:
A report of all the discovered kinds
of Unown.

name: Berry Pots
description:
Handy containers for cultivating
Berries wherever you go.

name: Dowsing MCHN
description:
It checks for unseen items in the
area
and makes noise and lights when it
finds something.

name: Blue Card
description:
A card to save points for the
Buena's Password show.

name: SlowpokeTail
description:
A very tasty tail of something.
It sells for a high price.

name: Clear Bell
description:
A very old-fashioned bell that makes
a
gentle ringing.

name: Card Key
description:
A card key that opens a shutter in
the
Radio Tower.

name: Basement Key
description:
A key that opens a door in the
Goldenrod Tunnel.

name: SquirtBottle
description:
A bottle used for watering plants in
the
Berry Pots.

name: Red Scale
description:
A scale from the red Gyarados. It
glows
red like a flame.

name: Lost Item
description:
The Mime Jr. doll that was lost by
the Copycat.

name: Pass
description:
A ticket required for riding the
Magnet
Train. It allows you to ride whenever
and however much you'd like.

name: Machine Part
description:
An important machine part for the
Power Plant that was stolen.

name: Silver Wing
description:
A strange, silvery feather
that sparkles.

name: Rainbow Wing
description:
A mystical rainbow feather
that sparkles.

name: Mystery Egg
description:
A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr.
Pokémon. What's in the Egg is
unknown.

name: Red Apricorn
description:
A red Apricorn.
It assails your nostrils.

name: Blu Apricorn
description:
A blue Apricorn.
It smells a bit like grass.

name: Ylw Apricorn
description:
A yellow Apricorn.
It has an invigorating scent.

name: Grn Apricorn
description:
A green Apricorn.
It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.

name: Pnk Apricorn
description:
A pink Apricorn.
It has a nice, sweet scent.

name: Wht Apricorn
description:
A white Apricorn.
It doesn't smell like anything.

name: Blk Apricorn
description:
A black Apricorn
It has an indescribable scent.

name: Fast Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon with high base
Speed.

name: Level Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon who are the same
level as yours.

name: Lure Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon
hooked
by a Rod when fishing.

name: Heavy Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching very heavy
Pokémon.

name: Love Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon of the same
evolution line as yours, but of the
opposite gender. It doesn't help
against genderless foes.

name: Friend Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which makes a Pokémon very
happy upon capture. It works well on
Pokémon which evolve due to
happiness.

name: Moon Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that
evolve using the Moon Stone.

name: Sport Ball
description:
A special Poké Ball for the
Bug-Catching Contest.

name: Park Ball
description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

name: Photo Album
description:
A nice photo album for storing all
the
photos taken along your adventure.

name: GB Sounds
description:
A music player that allows you to
listen
to nostalgic songs. It's operated
with
a single switch.

name: Tidal Bell
description:
A very old-fashioned bell that makes
a
gentle ringing.

name: RageCandyBar
description:
A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists
like to buy and take home. It
restores
the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.

name: Data Card 01
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many victories
you've had.

name: Data Card 02
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many
losses you've had.

name: Data Card 03
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have dashed.

name: Data Card 04
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have jumped.

name: Data Card 05
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won the Hurdle Dash.

name: Data Card 06
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won the Relay Run.

name: Data Card 07
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Pennant Capture.

name: Data Card 08
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Block Smash.

name: Data Card 09
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Disc Catch.

name: Data Card 10
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Snow Throw.

name: Data Card 11
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many points
your Pokémon scored.

name: Data Card 12
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have failed.

name: Data Card 13
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon impeded themselves.

name: Data Card 14
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have tackled.

name: Data Card 15
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have fallen down.

name: Data Card 16
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Ring Drop.

name: Data Card 17
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Lamp Jump.

name: Data Card 18
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Circle Push.

name: Data Card 19
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many
Link Pokéathlon wins you've had.

name: Data Card 20
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many
Link Pokéathlon losses you've had.

name: Data Card 21
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times
you've won an event.

name: Data Card 22
description:
An item to be held by Salamence which
raises its Sp.Attack.

name: Data Card 23
description:
An item to be held by Salamence which
raises its Sp.Defense.

name: Data Card 24
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
won Goal Roll.

name: Data Card 25
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon won individual prizes.

name: Data Card 26
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how many times you've
instructed your Pokémon.

name: Data Card 27
description:
It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a
card that shows how much time you've
spent in the Pokéathlon.

name: Jade Orb
description:
A shiny green orb that is said to
have
a legend and has a deep connection
with
the Hoenn region.

name: Lock Capsule
description:
A sturdy Capsule that can only be
opened with a special key.

name: Red Orb
description:
A shiny red orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection
with
the Hoenn region.

name: Blue Orb
description:
A shiny blue orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection
with
the Hoenn region.

name: Enigma Stone
description:
When held by a Pokémon, it will heal
for 25% HP if they are hit by a super
effective move.

name: Prism Scale
description:
A mysterious scale that evolves
certain Pokémon.
It shines in rainbow colors.

name: Eviolite
description:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp.
Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.

name: Float Stone
description:
A very light stone. It reduces the
weight of a Pokémon when held.

name: Rocky Helmet
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder of this item is hit by a
move that makes contact, it will
inflict damage on the attacker for
16.67% of their maximum HP per-hit.

name: Air Balloon
description:
When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon
will float into the air. When the
holder
is attacked, this item will burst.

name: Red Card
description:
A card with a mysterious power. When
the holder is struck by a foe, the
attacker is removed from battle.

name: Ring Target
description:
Moves that would otherwise have no
effect will land on the Pokémon that
holds it.

name: Binding Band
description:
When held by a Pokémon, it causes the
damage inflicted by binding moves
used by the holder to increase from
12.5% to 16.7% of the opponent's
maximum HP at the end of each turn.

name: Absorb Bulb
description:
A consumable bulb. If the holder is
hit
by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk
will rise.

name: Cell Battery
description:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.

name: Eject Button
description:
If the holder is hit by an attack, it
will
switch with another Pokémon in
your party.

name: Fire Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Fire-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Water Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Electric Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Electric-ty
pe moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Grass Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Grass-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Ice Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Ice-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Fighting Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Fighting-ty
pe moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Poison Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Poison-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Ground Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Ground-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Flying Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Flying-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Psychic Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Psychic-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Bug Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Bug-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Rock Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Rock-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Ghost Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Ghost-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Dragon Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Dragon-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Dark Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Dark-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Steel Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Steel-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Normal Gem
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Normal-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Health Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base HP of a
single Pokémon.

name: Muscle Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Attack
stat
of a single Pokémon.

name: Resist Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Defense
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Genius Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Sp. Atk
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Clever Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Sp. Def
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Swift Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Speed
stat
of a single Pokémon.

name: Pretty Wing
description:
Though this feather is beautiful,
it's
just a regular feather and has no
effect on Pokémon.

name: Cover Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its back.

name: Plume Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.

name: Liberty Pass
description:
A special pass to go to Liberty
Garden.
Board the ship in Castelia City.

name: Pass Orb
description:
A mysterious orb containing the power
of the Unova region, to be used when
generating Pass Power.

name: Dream Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which becomes more
effective if a wild Pokémon has been
asleep a few turns.

name: Poké Toy
description:
An item that attracts Pokémon.
Use it to flee from any battle with a
wild Pokémon.

name: Prop Case
description:
A lovely case to store colorful Props
for your Pokémon to wear in a
musical.

name: Dragon Skull
description:
A skull of a Pokémon which was said
to
have braved the angry waters to fly
around the world.

name: BalmMushroom
description:
A rare mushroom which gives off a
nice
fragrance.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Big Nugget
description:
A big nugget of pure gold that gives
off
a lustrous gleam.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Pearl String
description:
Very large pearls that sparkle in a
pretty silver color.
A maniac will buy them for a high
price.

name: Comet Shard
description:
A shard which fell to the ground when
a comet approached.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Relic Copper
description:
A copper coin used in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Relic Silver
description:
A silver coin used in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Relic Gold
description:
A gold coin used in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Relic Vase
description:
A vase made in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Relic Band
description:
A bracelet made in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Relic Statue
description:
A stone figure made in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Relic Crown
description:
A crown made in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Casteliacone
description:
Castelia City's specialty, soft-serve
ice cream. It heals all the status
problems of a single Pokémon.

name: Dire Hit 2
description:
It can be used many times to raise
the
critical-hit ratio of one Pokémon. It
wears off if the Pokémon is
withdrawn.

name: X Speed 2
description:
It sharply raises the Speed stat of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special 2
description:
It sharply raises the Sp. Atk stat of
a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Def 2
description:
It sharply raises the Sp. Def stat of
a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Defend 2
description:
It sharply raises the Defense stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Attack 2
description:
It sharply raises the Attack stat of
a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy 2
description:
It sharply raises the accuracy of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed 3
description:
It drastically raises the Speed stat
of
a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special 3
description:
It drastically raises the Sp. Atk
stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Def 3
description:
It drastically raises the Sp. Def
stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Defend 3
description:
It drastically raises the Defense
stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Attack 3
description:
It drastically raises the Attack stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy 3
description:
It drastically raises the accuracy of
a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed 6
description:
It raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special 6
description:
It raises the Sp. Atk stat of a
Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Def 6
description:
It raises the Sp. Def stat of a
Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Defend 6
description:
It raises the Defense stat of a
Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Attack 6
description:
It raises the Attack stat of a
Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if
the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy 6
description:
It raises the accuracy of a Pokémon
in
battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: Ability Urge
description:
When used, it activates the Ability
of
an ally Pokémon.

name: Item Drop
description:
When used, it causes an ally Pokémon
to drop a held item.

name: Item Urge
description:
When used, it causes an ally Pokémon
to use its held item.

name: Reset Urge
description:
When used, it restores any stat
changes of an ally Pokémon.

name: Dire Hit 3
description:
It can be used many times to greatly
raise a Pokémon's critical-hit ratio.
It
wears off if the Pokémon is
withdrawn.

name: Light Stone
description:
Reshiram's body was destroyed and
changed into this stone. It is said
to
be waiting for the emergence of a
hero.

name: Dark Stone
description:
Zekrom's body was destroyed and
changed into this stone. It is said
to
be waiting for the emergence of a
hero.

name: TM - Wild Charge
description:
The user shrouds itself in
electricity and smashes into its
target. It also damages the user a
little.

name: TM - Rock Smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch that
can shatter a rock. It may also
lower the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Snarl
description:
The user yells as if it is ranting
about something, making the
target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.

name: Xtransceiver
description:
A high-tech transceiver with a
camera function. It allows up to
four-way calls.
A rare stone.

name: Gram 1
description:
An important letter which
Wingull delivers.

name: Gram 2
description:
An important letter which
Wingull delivers.

name: Gram 3
description:
An important letter which
Wingull delivers.

name: Xtransceiver
description:
A high-tech transceiver with a
camera function. It allows up to
four-way calls.

name: Ultra Ball
description:
An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.

name: Great Ball
description:
A good, high-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a standard Poké Ball.

name: Poké Ball
description:
A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the
target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

name: Safari Ball
description:
A special Poké Ball that is used only
in
the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a
camouflage pattern.

name: Net Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

name: Dive Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball which
works especially well on Pokémon that
are encountered in water.

name: Nest Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on weaker
Pokémon in the wild.

name: Repeat Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which grows in strength
every consecutive capture of a
species of Pokémon. It powers up even
when using a different type of Poké

name: Cherish Ball

name: Potion

sorts of data.
It was produced by Silph Co.

name: Shell Bell
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It restores HP to the holder equal to
12.5% of damage inflicted by a move.

The effects of this item can be
nullified by the Heal Block ability.

name: Sea Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Marill or Azumarill while
breeding, it may help them produce a
Azurill egg.

name: Lax Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It slightly reduces the foe's
Accuracy.

If held by a Wobbuffet while breeding,
it may help them produce a Wynaut
egg.

name: Lucky Punch
description:
An item to be held by Chansey. It is
a
pair of gloves that boosts Chansey's
critical-hit ratio.

name: Metal Powder
description:
An item to be held by Ditto.
Extremely fine yet hard, this odd
powder boosts the Defense stat.

name: Thick Club
description:
An item to be held by Cubone or
Marowak. It is a hard bone of some
sort that boosts the Attack stat.

name: Stick
description:
An item to be held by Farfetch'd. It
is
a very long and stiff stalk of leek
that boosts the critical-hit ratio.

name: Red Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cool aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Blue Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Beauty aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Pink Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cute aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Green Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Smart aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Yellow Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Tough aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

name: Wide Lens
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a magnifying lens that slightly
boosts the accuracy of moves.

name: Muscle Band
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the power of Physical moves
by 10%.

name: Wise Glasses
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It
is
a thick pair of glasses that slightly
boosts the power of special moves.

name: Expert Belt
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the power of Super Effective
moves by 20%.

name: Light Clay
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder uses the moves Light
Screen or Reflect, their effects will
be increased from 5 to 8 turns.

name: Life Orb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase the
power of moves by 30% when in battle,
but at the cost of 10% of the
attacker's Maximum HP per-turn.

name: Power Herb
description:
A single-use item to be held by a
Pokémon. It allows the immediate use
of
a move that charges on the first
turn.

name: Toxic Orb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a bizarre orb that badly
poisons
the holder in battle.

name: Flame Orb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a
burn on the holder in battle.

name: Quick Powder
description:
An item to be held by Ditto.
Extremely fine yet hard, this odd
powder boosts the Speed stat.

name: Focus Sash
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If it has full HP, The holder will
endure a potential KO attack with
1HP.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Zoom Lens
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after its
target, its accuracy will be boosted.

name: Metronome
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the power of a move by 20%
for each consecutive use, up to a
maximum increase of 100%.

name: Iron Ball
description:
A Pokémon held item that cuts Speed.
It makes Flying-type and levitating
holders susceptible to Ground moves.

name: Lagging Tail
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is tremendously heavy and makes
the holder move slower than usual.

name: Destiny Knot
description:
A long, thin, bright-red string to
be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

name: Black Sludge
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
When held by a Poison-type Pokémon in
battle, 6.25% of the holder's HP is
restored at the end of each turn.

When held by a Non-Poison-type
Pokémon, it inflicts 12.5% of damage
at the end of each turn. Pokémon with
the ability Magic Guard are immune to
this effect.

name: Icy Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Snowy
weather to 8 turns, when created by
the item holder.

name: Smooth Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Sandstorm
weather to 8 turns, when created by
the item holder.

name: Heat Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Harsh
Sunlight weather to 8 turns, when
created by the item holder.

name: Damp Rock
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Rain
weather to 8 turns, when created by
the item holder.

name: Grip Claw
description:
When held by a Pokémon, it causes
binding moves used by the holder to
always continue for 7 turns.

name: Choice Scarf
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase Speed
by 50% when in battle, but only
allows the use of the first move
selected.

name: Sticky Barb
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It inflicts the holder with 12.5% of
its maximum HP each turn.

If the holder is hit with a move that
makes contact, the Sticky Barb will
latch onto the opponent.

Pokémon with the ability Magic Guard
do not take damage from this item.

name: Power Bracer
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Attack
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Belt
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Defense
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Lens
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Sp.Atk
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Band
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Sp.Def
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Anklet
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Speed
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Power Weight
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's HP IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Shed Shell
description:
A tough, discarded carapace to be
held
by a Pokémon. It enables the holder
to
switch with a waiting Pokémon in
battle.

name: Big Root
description:
A Pokémon held item that boosts the
power of HP-stealing moves to let the
holder recover more HP.

name: Choice Specs
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase Sp.Atk
by 50% when in battle, but only
allows the use of the first move
selected.

name: Flame Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fire-type moves.

name: Splash Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Water-type moves.

name: Zap Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Electric-type moves.

name: Meadow Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Grass-type moves.

name: Icicle Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Ice-type moves.

name: Fist Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fighting-type moves.

name: Toxic Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Poison-type moves.

name: Earth Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Ground-type moves.

name: Sky Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Flying-type moves.

name: Mind Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Psychic-type moves.

name: Insect Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Bug-type moves.

name: Stone Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Rock-type moves.

name: Spooky Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Ghost-type moves.

name: Draco Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Dragon-type moves.

name: Dread Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Dark-type moves.

name: Iron Plate
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Steel-type moves.

name: Odd Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Psychic-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Mr. Mime while breeding,
it may help them produce a Mime Jr.
egg.

name: Rock Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Rock-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Sudowoodo while breeding,
it may help them produce a Bonsly
egg.

name: Full Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
it causes the Pokémon to move last
when using a move of the same
priority as the opponent.

If held by a Snorlax while breeding,
it may help them produce a Munchlax
egg.

name: Wave Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Mantine while breeding,
it may help them produce a Mantyke
egg.

name: Rose Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Grass-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Roselia or Roserade while
breeding, it may help them produce a
Budew egg.

name: Luck Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If held by a Chansey while breeding,
it may help them produce a Happiny
egg.

name: Pure Incense
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It slightly reduces the chance of
encountering wild Pokémon.

If held by a Chimecho while breeding,
it may help them produce a Chingling
egg.

name: Protector
description:
A protective item of some sort.
It is extremely stiff and heavy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Electirizer
description:
A box packed with a tremendous
amount of electric energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Magmarizer
description:
A box packed with a tremendous
amount of magma energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Dubious Disc
description:
A transparent device overflowing with
dubious data.
Its producer is unknown.

name: Reaper Cloth
description:
A cloth imbued with horrifyingly
strong
spiritual energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Razor Claw
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a sharply hooked claw that ups
the holder's critical-hit ratio.

name: Razor Fang
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may make foes and allies flinch
when the holder inflicts damage.

name: TM - Hone Claws
description:
The user sharpens its claws to boost
its Attack stat and accuracy.

name: TM - Dragon Claw
description:
The user slashes the target with
huge, sharp claws.

name: TM - Psyshock
description:
The user materializes an odd psychic
wave to attack the target. This
attack does physical damage.

name: TM - Calm Mind
description:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and calms its spirit to raise its
Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Roar
description:
The target is scared off and
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Toxic
description:
A move that leaves the target badly
poisoned. Its poison damage worsens
every turn.

name: TM - Snowscape
description:
A snowstorm forms on the field for 5
turns. Snow boosts the Defense stat
of Ice-types by 50%.

name: TM - Bulk Up
description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up its body, boosting both its
Attack and Defense stats.

name: TM - Venoshock
description:
The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is
poisoned.

name: TM - Hidden Power
description:
An attack which varies in type
depending on its user. Its type may
be changed with 40 Gems.

name: TM - Sunny Day
description:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up Fire-type
moves.

name: TM - Taunt
description:
The target is taunted into a rage
that allows it to use only attack
moves for three turns.

name: TM - Ice Beam
description:
The target is struck with an
icy-cold beam of energy. It may
also freeze the target solid.

name: TM - Blizzard
description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the opposing team. It may
also freeze them solid.

name: TM - Hyper Beam
description:
The target is attacked with a
powerful beam. The user must rest
on the next turn to regain its
energy.

name: TM - Light Screen
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from special
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Protect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Rain Dance
description:
The user summons a heavy rain that
falls for five turns, powering up
Water-type moves.

name: TM - Telekinesis
description:
The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is
easier to hit for three turns.

name: TM - Safeguard
description:
The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems for
five turns.

name: TM - Frustration
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - SolarBeam
description:
A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam
on the second turn.

name: TM - Smack Down
description:
The user throws a stone or
projectile to attack an opponent. A
flying Pokémon will fall to the
ground when hit.

name: TM - Thunderbolt
description:
A strong electric blast is loosed at
the target. It may also leave the
target with paralysis.

name: TM - Thunder
description:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on
the target to inflict damage. It
may also leave the target with
paralysis.

name: TM - Earthquake
description:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes those around it.

name: TM - Return
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - Dig
description:
The user burrows, then attacks on
the second turn. It can also be
used to exit dungeons.

name: TM - Psychic
description:
The target is hit by a strong
telekinetic force. It may also
reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Shadow Ball
description:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the
target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Brick Break
description:
The user attacks with a swift chop.
It can also break any barrier such
as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: TM - Double Team
description:
By moving rapidly, the user makes
illusory copies of itself to raise
its evasiveness.

name: TM - Reflect
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from physical
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Sludge Wave
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant sludge wave. It may
also poison those hit.

name: TM - Flamethrower
description:
The target is scorched with an
intense blast of fire. It may also
leave the target with a burn.

name: TM - Sludge Bomb
description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target. It may also poison the
target.

name: TM - Sandstorm
description:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to
hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

name: TM - Fire Blast
description:
The target is attacked with an
intense blast of all-consuming
fire. It may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: TM - Rock Tomb
description:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
It also lowers the target's Speed
by preventing its movement.

name: TM - Aerial Ace
description:
The user confounds the target with
speed, then slashes. The attack
lands without fail.

name: TM - Torment
description:
The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of
using the same move twice in a
row.

name: TM - Facade
description:
An attack move that doubles its
power if the user is poisoned,
burned, or has paralysis.

name: TM - Flame Charge
description:
The user cloaks itself with flame
and attacks. Building up more
power, it raises the user's Speed
stat.

name: TM - Rest
description:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user's
HP and heals any status problem.

name: TM - Attract
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

name: TM - Thief
description:
An attack which steals the foe's
held item if the user isn't already
holding one. Its effects are
temporary when stealing from
Trainers.

name: TM - Low Sweep
description:
The user attacks the target's legs
swiftly, reducing the target's
Speed stat.

name: TM - Round
description:
The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round
and make the attack do greater
damage.

name: TM - Echoed Voice
description:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater
damage.

name: TM - Overheat
description:
The user attacks the target at full
power. The attack's recoil harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Ally Switch
description:
The user teleports, switching places
with its adjacent ally. It may fail
if used consecutively.

name: TM - Focus Blast
description:
The user heightens its mental focus
and unleashes its power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - Energy Ball
description:
The user draws power from nature and
fires it at the target. It may also
lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - False Swipe
description:
A restrained attack that prevents
the target from fainting. The
target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: TM - Scald
description:
The user shoots boiling hot water at
its target. It may also leave the
target with a burn.

name: TM - Fling
description:
The user flings its item at the foe,
destroying it. In PvP, only
consumable items are destroyed
permanently. The move's power and
effects vary depending on what item
is thrown.

name: TM - Charge Beam
description:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any
remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Sky Drop
description:
The user takes the target into the
sky, then drops it during the next
turn. The target cannot attack
while in the sky.

name: TM - Incinerate
description:
The user attacks the target with
fire. If the target is holding a
Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up
and unusable.

name: TM - Quash
description:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.

name: TM - Will-O-Wisp
description:
The user shoots a sinister,
bluish-white flame at the target to
inflict a burn.

name: TM - Acrobatics
description:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive
damage.

name: TM - Embargo
description:
It prevents the target from using
its held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.

name: TM - Explosion
description:
The user explodes to inflict damage
on those around it. The user faints
upon using this move.

name: TM - Shadow Claw
description:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made from shadows. Critical hits
land more easily.

name: TM - Payback
description:
If the user moves after the target,
this attack's power will be
doubled.

name: TM - Retaliate
description:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally. If an ally fainted in the
previous turn, this attack's damage
increases.

name: TM - Giga Impact
description:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power. The user
must rest on the next turn.

name: TM - Rock Polish
description:
The user polishes its body to reduce
drag. It can sharply raise the
Speed stat.

name: TM - Flash
description:
The user flashes a bright light that
cuts the target's accuracy. It can
also be used to illuminate caves.

name: TM - Stone Edge
description:
The user stabs the foe with
sharpened stones from below. It has
a high critical-hit ratio.

name: TM - Volt Switch
description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

name: TM - Thunder Wave
description:
A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.

name: TM - Gyro Ball
description:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swords Dance
description:
A frenetic dance to uplift the
fighting spirit. It sharply raises
the user's Attack stat.

name: TM - Struggle Bug
description:
While resisting, the user attacks
the opposing Pokémon. The targets'
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name: TM - Psych Up
description:
The user hypnotizes itself into
copying any stat change made by the
target.

name: TM - Bulldoze
description:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is
reduced.

name: TM - Frost Breath
description:
The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results
in a critical hit.

name: TM - Rock Slide
description:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. It
may also make the targets flinch.

name: TM - X-Scissor
description:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

name: TM - Dragon Tail
description:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Work Up
description:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: TM - Poison Jab
description:
The target is stabbed with a
tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
It may also poison the target.

name: TM - Dream Eater
description:
The user eats the dreams of a
sleeping target. It absorbs half
the damage caused to heal the
user's HP.

name: TM - Grass Knot
description:
The user snares the target with
grass and trips it. The heavier the
target, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swagger
description:
The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, it also sharply
raises the target's Attack stat.

name: TM - Pluck
description:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.

name: TM - U-turn
description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

name: TM - Substitute
description:
The user makes a copy of itself
using some of its HP. The copy
serves as the user's decoy.

name: TM - Flash Cannon
description:
The user gathers all its light
energy and releases it at once. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Trick Room
description:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which slower Pokémon get to move
first for five turns.

name: Fast Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon with high base
Speed.

name: Level Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon who are the same
level as yours.

name: Lure Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon
hooked
by a Rod when fishing.

name: Heavy Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching very heavy
Pokémon.

name: Love Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon of the same
evolution line as yours, but of the
opposite gender. It doesn't help
against genderless foes.

name: Friend Ball
description:
A Poké Ball which makes a Pokémon very
happy upon capture. It works well on
Pokémon which evolve due to
happiness.

name: Moon Ball
description:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that
evolve using the Moon Stone.

name: Sport Ball
description:
A special Poké Ball for the
Bug-Catching Contest.

name: Park Ball
description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

name: Prism Scale
description:
A mysterious scale that evolves
certain Pokémon.
It shines in rainbow colors.

name: Eviolite
description:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp.
Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.

name: Float Stone
description:
A very light stone. It reduces the
weight of a Pokémon when held.

name: Rocky Helmet
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder of this item is hit by a
move that makes contact, it will
inflict damage on the attacker for
16.67% of their maximum HP per-hit.

name: Air Balloon
description:
When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon
will float into the air. When the
holder
is attacked, this item will burst.

name: Red Card
description:
A card with a mysterious power. When
the holder is struck by a foe, the
attacker is removed from battle.

name: Ring Target
description:
Moves that would otherwise have no
effect will land on the Pokémon that
holds it.

name: Binding Band
description:
When held by a Pokémon, it causes the
damage inflicted by binding moves
used by the holder to increase from
12.5% to 16.7% of the opponent's
maximum HP at the end of each turn.

name: Absorb Bulb
description:
A consumable bulb. If the holder is
hit
by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk
will rise.

name: Cell Battery
description:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.

name: Eject Button
description:
If the holder is hit by an attack, it
will
switch with another Pokémon in
your party.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Health Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base HP of a
single Pokémon.

name: Muscle Wing
description:

slightly increases the base Attack
stat
of a single Pokémon.

name: Resist Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Defense
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Genius Wing
description:

slightly increases the base Sp. Atk
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Clever Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Sp. Def
stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Swift Wing
description:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base Speed
stat
of a single Pokémon.

name: Pretty Wing
description:
Though this feather is beautiful,
it's
just a regular feather and has no
effect on Pokémon.

name: Cover Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its back.

name: Plume Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.

name: BalmMushroom
description:
A rare mushroom which gives off a
nice
fragrance.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Big Nugget
description:
A big nugget of pure gold that gives
off
a lustrous gleam.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: Pearl String
description:
Very large pearls that sparkle in a
pretty silver color.
A maniac will buy them for a high
price.

name: Comet Shard
description:
A shard which fell to the ground when
a comet approached.
A maniac will buy it for a high
price.

name: TM - Wild Charge
description:
The user shrouds itself in
electricity and smashes into its
target. It also damages the user a
little.

name: TM - Rock Smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch that
can shatter a rock. It may also
lower the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Snarl
description:
The user yells as if it is ranting
about something, making the
target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.

name: Name Change Contract
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's name.

Can only be used once.

name: Makeover Kit
description:
An item which can be used to change
your character's base appearance.

Can only be used once.

name: Team Name Change Plaque
description:
An item which can be used to change
your team's name and tag.

Can only be used once.
Must be used by team leader.

name: Ability Pill
description:
A pill that can be used to switch the
ability of a Pokémon.

Consumed on use.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 7 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 15 DAYS
description:
An item which can be used to promote
your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Donator Status Ticket - 30 DAYS
description:
