your account to Donator Status.

Donator Status benefits include:
+25% EXP in battles.
+10% chance of encountering shinies.
+10% faster egg hatching.
+5% money gain from trainers.

name: Plain Spicy Seed
description:
A spicy seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Spicy Seed
description:
A spicy seed which can be planted in
loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Dry Seed
description:

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Dry Seed
description:

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Sweet Seed

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Very Sweet Seed

loamy soil to grow certain berries.

name: Plain Bitter Seed

name: Plain Sour Seed

name: Very Sour Seed

name: Genderswap Ticket

An item which can be used to change
your character's gender and base
appearance.

Can only be used once.

name: PC Expansion Drive
description:
An item which can be used to expand
the PC of a single character by 60
slots.

name: Cut Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use Cut
outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

Requires a certain badge in each
region to use.

name: Defog Ocarina

name: 100RP Reward Point Voucher
description:
An item which increases the Reward
Points
of an account by 100RP.

Reward Points given by Vouchers can't
be used to purchase other Vouchers.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: 500RP Reward Point Voucher
description:
An item which increases the Reward
Points
of an account by 500RP.

Reward Points given by Vouchers can't
be used to purchase other Vouchers.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: 1,000RP Reward Point Voucher
description:
An item which increases the Reward
Points
of an account by 1,000RP.

Reward Points given by Vouchers can't
be used to purchase other Vouchers.

This item is consumed upon use.

name: Lucky Egg (Small)
description:
An item which increases the amount of
EXP gained for a short period of
time.

1.50x EXP gain.
Stacks with other bonuses.
Consumed upon use.
Effects last 30 minutes.

name: Battle Box Expansion Drive
description:
An item which can be used to expand
the PC to include 3 more Battle
Boxes.

A character can have a maximum of
30 Battle Boxes.

name: Whirlpool Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use
Whirlpool outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

Requires a certain badge in each
region to use.

name: Dig Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use Dig
outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

name: Teleport Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use
Teleport outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

name: Headbutt Ocarina
description:
Summons a Pokémon which will use
Headbutt outside of a battle.

Cannot be used in certain instances.

This item may only be used in Johto.

name: Broom Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to
Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will clear stat drops on the
allied field, stat boosts on the
foe's field, and cloaks the allied
field with Mist for 2 turns.

name: Bat Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to
Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will protect the allied field
with Light Screen and Reflect for 3
turns.

name: Pumpkin Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to
Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will heal the allied field by
33% of their maximum HP.

name: Ghost Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to
Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will heal any status ailments
of allies.

name: Cat Cookie
description:
A tasty cookie exclusive to
Halloween.
It restores HP when eaten, but causes
a Sugar Rush in battle.

When fighting Pumpking, eating the
cookie will double the allied field's
speed for 4 turns.

name: Super HP Up
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base HP of a single
Pokémon.

name: Hyper HP Up

A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base HP of a single
Pokémon.

name: Max HP Up
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base HP of a single
Pokémon.

It raises the base Attack stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Protein

It raises the base Attack stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Max Protein

It raises the base Attack stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Iron

It raises the base Defense stat of a

name: Super Carbos

It raises the base Speed stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Carbos
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Speed stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Max Carbos

A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Speed stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Super Calcium
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special
Attack) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Calcium
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special
Attack) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Max Calcium
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special
Attack) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Super Zinc
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Def (Special
Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Zinc
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Def (Special
Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Max Zinc
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Def (Special
Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: TM - Focus Punch
description:
The user focuses its mind before
launching a punch. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.

name: TM - Water Pulse
description:
The user attacks the target with a
pulsing blast of water. It may also
confuse the target.

name: TM - Bullet Seed
description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the target. Two to five seeds are
shot in rapid succession.

name: TM - Giga Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's HP is restored by half the
damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Iron Tail
description:
The target is slammed with a
steel-hard tail. It may also lower
the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Shock Wave
description:
The user strikes the target with a
quick jolt of electricity. This
attack cannot be evaded.

name: TM - Secret Power
description:
The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its added effects
vary depending on the user's
environment.

name: TM - Steel Wing
description:
The target is hit with wings of
steel. It may also raise the user's
Defense stat.

name: TM - Skill Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to exchange Abilities with the
target.

name: TM - Snatch
description:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or stat-changing move the
opponent attempts to use.

name: TM - Roost
description:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user's HP by up to
half of its max HP.

name: TM - Brine
description:
If the target's HP is down to about
half, this attack will hit with
double the power.

name: TM - Endure
description:
The user endures any attack with at
least 1 HP. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Dragon Pulse
description:
The target is attacked with a shock
wave generated by the user's gaping
mouth.

name: TM - Drain Punch
description:
An energy-draining punch. The user's
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

name: TM - Silver Wind
description:
The target is attacked with powdery
scales blown by wind. It may also
raise all the user's stats.

name: TM - Recycle
description:
The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can
be used again.

name: TM - Avalanche
description:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the target in the same
turn.

name: TM - Stealth Rock
description:
The user lays a trap of levitating
stones around the opponent's team.
The trap hurts opponents that
switch into battle.

name: TM - Captivate
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target is charmed into
harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Dark Pulse
description:
The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. It may
also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Sleep Talk
description:
While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves it
knows.

name: TM - Natural Gift
description:
The user draws power to attack by
using its held Berry. The Berry
determines its type and power.

name: TM - Leech Life
description:
The user drains the target's blood.
The user's HP is restored by half
the damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Nature Power
description:
An attack that makes use of nature's
power. Its effects vary depending
on the user's environment.

name: TM - Air Slash
description:
The user attacks with a blade of air
that slices even the sky. It may
also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Bug Buzz
description:
The user vibrates its wings to
generate a damaging sound wave. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Power Gem
description:
The user attacks with a ray of light
that sparkles as if it were made of
gemstones.

name: TM - Razor Wind
description:
A two-turn attack. Blades of wind
hit opposing Pokémon on the second
turn. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Brave Bird
description:
The user tucks in its wings and
charges from a low altitude. The
user also takes serious damage.

name: TM - Whirlwind
description:
The target is blown away, to be
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Nasty Plot
description:
The user stimulates its brain by
thinking bad thoughts. It sharply
raises the user's Sp. Atk.

name: TM - Thunder Fang
description:
The user bites with electrified
fangs. It may also make the target
flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: TM - Ice Fang
description:
The user bites with cold-infused
fangs. It may also make the target
flinch or leave it frozen.

name: TM - Fire Fang
description:
The user bites with flame-cloaked
fangs. It may also make the target
flinch or leave it burned.

name: TM - Psycho Cut
description:
The user tears at the target with
blades formed by psychic power.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM - Horn Drill
description:
The user stabs the target with a
horn that rotates like a drill. If
it hits, the target faints
instantly.

name: TM - Take Down
description:
A reckless, full-body charge attack
for slamming into the target. It
also damages the user a little.

name: TM - Leaf Storm
description:
The user whips up a storm of leaves
around the target. The attack's
recoil harshly reduces the user's
Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Power Whip
description:
The user violently whirls its vines
or tentacles to harshly lash the
target.

name: TM - Pin Missile
description:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target
in rapid succession. They hit two
to five times in a row.

name: TM - Cross Poison
description:
A slashing attack with a poisonous
blade that may also leave the
target poisoned. Critical hits land
more easily.

name: TM - Water Gun
description:
The target is blasted with a
forceful shot of water.

name: TM - Hydro Pump
description:
The target is blasted by a huge
volume of water launched under
great pressure.

name: TM - BubbleBeam
description:
A spray of bubbles is forcefully
ejected at the opposing team. It
may also lower their Speed stats.

name: TM - Submission
description:
The user grabs the target and
recklessly dives for the ground. It
also hurts the user slightly.

name: TM - Mega Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's HP is restored by half the
damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Dragon Rage
description:
This attack hits the target with a
shock wave of pure rage. This
attack always inflicts 40 HP
damage.

name: TM - Fire Spin
description:
The target becomes trapped within a
fierce vortex of fire that rages
for four to five turns.

name: TM - Heavy Slam
description:
The user slams into the target with
its heavy body. The more the user
outweighs the target, the greater
its damage.

name: TM - Electro Ball
description:
The user hurls an electric orb at
the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the
damage.

name: TM - Fissure
description:
The user opens up a fissure in the
ground and drops the target in. The
target instantly faints if it
hits.

name: TM - Agility
description:
The user relaxes and lightens its
body to move faster. It sharply
boosts the Speed stat.

name: TM - Rage
description:
As long as this move is in use, the
power of rage raises the Attack
stat each time the user is hit in
battle.

name: TM - Teleport
description:
When used by a Trainer, it switches
the user out no matter what. Wild
Pokémon may flee instantly. When
used out of battle, it will warp
you to the last Pokémon Center.

name: TM - Stored Power
description:
The user attacks the target with
stored power. The more the user's
stats are raised, the greater the
damage.

name: TM - Hex
description:
This relentless attack does massive
damage to a target affected by
status problems.

name: TM - Focus Energy
description:
The user takes a deep breath and
focuses so that critical hits land
more easily.

name: TM - Bide
description:
The user endures attacks for two
turns, then strikes back to cause
double the damage taken.

name: TM - Egg Bomb
description:
A large egg is hurled at the target
with maximum force to inflict
damage.

name: TM - Skull Bash
description:
The user tucks in its head to raise
its Defense in the first turn, then
rams the target on the next turn.

name: TM - Amnesia
description:
The user temporarily empties its
mind to forget its concerns. It
sharply raises the user's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Razor Shell
description:
The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower
the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Heat Crash
description:
The user slams its target with its
flame- covered body. The more the
user outweighs the target, the
greater the damage.

name: TM - Tail Slap
description:
The user attacks by striking the
target with its hard tail. It hits
the target two to five times in a
row.

name: TM - Hurricane
description:
The user attacks by wrapping its
opponent in a fierce wind that
flies up into the sky. It may also
confuse the target.

name: TM - Psywave
description:
The target is attacked with an odd
psychic wave. The attack varies in
intensity.

name: TM - Tri Attack
description:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn,
freeze, or leave the target with
paralysis.

name: TM - Curse
description:
A move which functions differently
depending on the type of its user.
When used by a Ghost, the target
loses 1/4 of their maximum HP every
turn, but the user immediately
loses half of theirs. For other
types, it will reduce Speed while
increasing Attack & Defense by 1
stage.

name: TM - Reversal
description:
An all-out attack that becomes more
powerful the less HP the user has.

name: TM - Scary Face
description:
The user frightens the target with a
scary face to harshly reduce its
Speed stat.

name: TM - Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of spikes at
the opposing team's feet. The trap
hurts Pokémon that switch into
battle.

name: TM - Zap Cannon
description:
The user fires an electric blast
like a cannon to inflict damage and
cause paralysis.

name: TM - Detect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Charm
description:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target's Attack is harshly
lowered.

name: TM - Megahorn
description:
Using its tough and impressive horn,
the user rams into the target with
no letup.

name: TM - DragonBreath
description:
The user exhales a mighty gust that
inflicts damage. It may also leave
the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Baton Pass
description:
The user switches places with a
Pokémon in your party, passing
along some effects. Will not pass
stat changes or status ailments.

name: TM - Encore
description:
The user compels the target to keep
using only the move it last used
for three turns.

name: TM - Sweet Scent
description:
Expels a sweet scent which lowers
the foe's Evasion. It lures hordes
of Pokémon when used in areas which
have wild encounters, but requires
more PP.

name: TM - Crunch
description:
Crunches the foe with its sharp
teeth. It may lower their Defense
stat.

name: TM - Future Sight
description:
Two turns after this move is used, a
hunk of psychic energy attacks the
target.

name: TM - Whirlpool
description:
Traps foes in a violent swirling
whirlpool for four to five turns.

name: TM - Beat Up
description:
The user gets all party Pokémon to
attack the target. The more party
Pokémon, the greater the number of
attacks.

name: TM - Revenge
description:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the opponent in the same
turn.

name: TM - Imprison
description:
If the opponents know any move also
known by the user, the opponents
are prevented from using it.

name: TM - Screech
description:
An earsplitting screech harshly
reduces the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Blaze Kick
description:
The user launches a kick that lands
a critical hit more easily. It may
also leave the target with a burn.

name: TM - Weather Ball
description:
An attack move that varies in power
and type depending on the weather.

name: TM - Fake Tears
description:
The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Cosmic Power
description:
The user absorbs a mystical power
from space to raise its Defense and
Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Sand Tomb
description:
The user traps the target inside a
harshly raging sandstorm for four
to five turns.

name: TM - Muddy Water
description:
The user attacks by shooting muddy
water at the opposing team. It may
also lower the targets' accuracy.

name: TM - Icicle Spear
description:
The user launches sharp icicles at
the target. It strikes two to five
times in a row.

name: TM - Mud Shot
description:
The user attacks by hurling a blob
of mud at the target. It also
reduces the target's Speed.

name: TM - Magical Leaf
description:
The user scatters curious leaves
that chase the target. This attack
will not miss.

name: TM - Leaf Blade
description:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a
sword and attacks by cutting its
target. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Dragon Dance
description:
The user vigorously performs a
mystic, powerful dance that boosts
its Attack and Speed stats.

name: TM - Rock Blast
description:
The user hurls hard rocks at the
target. Two to five rocks are
launched in quick succession.

name: TM - Close Combat
description:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. It also
cuts the user's Defense and Sp.
Def.

name: TM - Assurance
description:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this
attack's power is doubled.

name: TM - Power Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Attack and
Sp. Atk with the target.

name: TM - Guard Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Defense
and Sp. Def with the target.

name: TM - Pay Day
description:
Throws coins at the foe which are
recovered after the battle. The
amount of coins increases with the
foe's level. It's only effective
once per battle.

name: TM - Toxic Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of poison
spikes at the opponent's feet. They
poison opponents that switch into
battle.

name: TM - Flare Blitz
description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and
charges at the target. The user
sustains serious damage and may
leave the target burned.

name: TM - Aura Sphere
description:
The user looses a blast of aura
power from deep within its body at
the target. This move is certain to
hit.

name: TM - Counter
description:
A retaliation move that counters any
physical attack, inflicting double
the damage taken.

name: TM - Metronome
description:
The user waggles a finger and
stimulates its brain into randomly
using nearly any move.

name: TM - Mega Kick
description:
The target is attacked by a kick
launched with muscle-packed power.

name: TM - Mega Punch
description:
The target is slugged by a punch
thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: TM - Double-Edge
description:
A reckless, life-risking tackle. It
also damages the user by a fairly
large amount, however.

name: TM - Body Slam
description:
The user drops onto the target with
its full body weight. It may also
leave the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Softboiled
description:
Heals the user by half of its max
HP.

name: TM - Rollout
description:
The user continually rolls into the
target over five turns. It becomes
stronger each time it hits.

name: TM - DynamicPunch
description:
The user punches the target with
full, concentrated power. It
confuses the target if it hits.

name: TM - Mimic
description:
The user copies the target's last
move. The move can be used during
battle until the Pokémon is
switched out.

name: TM - Fury Cutter
description:
The target is slashed with scythes
or claws. Its power increases if it
hits in succession.

name: TM - Seismic Toss
description:
The target is thrown using the power
of gravity. It inflicts damage
equal to the user's level.

name: TM - Mud-Slap
description:
The user hurls mud in the target's
face to inflict damage and lower
its accuracy.

name: TM - Psybeam
description:
The target is attacked with a
peculiar ray. It may also cause
confusion.

name: TM - Confuse Ray
description:
The target is exposed to a sinister
ray that triggers confusion.

name: TM - Poison Tail
description:
The user hits the target with its
tail. It may also poison the
target. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Metal Claw
description:
The target is raked with steel
claws. It may also raise the user's
Attack stat.

name: TM - Swift
description:
Star-shaped rays are shot at the
opposing team. This attack never
misses.

name: TM - Icy Wind
description:
The user attacks with a gust of
chilled air. It also reduces the
targets' Speed stat.

name: TM - Air Cutter
description:
The user launches razor-like wind to
slash the opposing team. Critical
hits land more easily.

name: TM - Night Shade
description:
The user makes the target see a
frightening mirage. It inflicts
damage matching the user's level.

name: TM - Foul Play
description:
The user turns the target's power
against it. The higher the target's
Attack stat, the greater the
damage.

name: TM - Seed Bomb
description:
The user slams a barrage of
hard-shelled seeds down on the
target from above.

name: TM - Iron Head
description:
The user slams the target with its
steel-hard head. It may also make
the target flinch.

name: TM - Gunk Shot
description:
The user shoots filthy garbage at
the target to attack. It may also
poison the target.

name: TM - Iron Defense
description:
The user hardens its body's surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.

name: TM - Drill Run
description:
The user crashes into its target
while rotating its body like a
drill. Critical hits land more
easily.

name: TM - Trick
description:
The user catches the target off
guard and swaps its held item with
its own.

name: TM - Tailwind
description:
The user whips up a turbulent
whirlwind that ups the Speed of all
party Pokémon for four turns.

name: TM - Hyper Voice
description:
The user lets loose a horribly
echoing shout with the power to
inflict damage.

name: TM - Heat Wave
description:
The user attacks by exhaling hot
breath on the opposing team. It may
also leave targets with a burn.

name: TM - Earth Power
description:
The user makes the ground under the
target erupt with power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - Outrage
description:
The user rampages and attacks for
two to three turns. It then becomes
confused, however.

name: TM - Draco Meteor
description:
Comets are summoned down from the
sky onto the target. The attack's
recoil harshly reduces the user's
Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Fire Punch
description:
The target is punched with a fiery
fist. It may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: TM - Ice Punch
description:
The target is punched with an icy
fist. It may also leave the target
frozen.

name: TM - ThunderPunch
description:
The target is punched with an
electrified fist. It may also leave
the target with paralysis.

name: TM - Zen Headbutt
description:
The user focuses its willpower to
its head and attacks the target. It
may also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Helping Hand
description:
The user assists an ally by boosting
the power of its attack.

name: TM - Low Kick
description:
A powerful low kick that makes the
target fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on heavier targets.

name: TM - Acid Spray
description:
The user spits fluid that works to
melt the target. This harshly
reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Headbutt
description:
The user sticks out its head and
attacks by charging straight into
the target. It may also make the
target flinch.

name: TM - Selfdestruct
description:
The user attacks everything around
it by causing an explosion. The
user faints upon using this move.

name: TM - Superpower
description:
The user attacks the target with
great power. However, it also
lowers the user's Attack and
Defense.

name: TM - Charge
description:
The user charges up, doubling the
power of the next Electric-type
move. It also raises the Sp. Def of
the user by 1 stage.

name: TM - Haze
description:
The user creates a haze that
eliminates every stat change among
all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: TM - Spite
description:
The user unleashes its grudge on the
move last used by the target by
cutting 4 PP from it.

name: TM - Gravity
description:
Gravity is intensified for five
turns, making moves involving
flying unusable and negating
Levitate.

name: TM - Knock Off
description:
The user slaps down the target's
held item, preventing that item
from being used in the battle.

name: TM - Bug Bite
description:
The user bites the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.

name: TM - Super Fang
description:
The user chomps hard on the target
with its sharp front fangs. It cuts
the target's HP to half.

name: TM - Vacuum Wave
description:
The user whirls its fists to send a
wave of pure vacuum at the target.
This move always goes first.

name: TM - Uproar
description:
The user attacks in an uproar for
three turns. Over that time, no one
can fall asleep.

name: Master Ball
description:
The best Ball with the ultimate level
of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

name: Ultra Ball
description:
An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.

name: Great Ball
description:
A good, high-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a standard Poké Ball.

name: Poké Ball
description:
A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the
target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

name: Safari Ball
description:
A special Poké Ball that is used only
in
the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a
camouflage pattern.

name: Net Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

name: Dive Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Pokémon that
live in the sea.

name: Nest Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on weaker
Pokémon in the wild.

name: Repeat Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Pokémon
species that were previously caught.

name: Timer Ball
description:
A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

name: Luxury Ball
description:
A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a
caught wild Pokémon quickly grow
friendly.

name: Premier Ball
description:
A somewhat rare Poké Ball that has
been specially made to commemorate
an event of some sort.

name: Dusk Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like
caves.

name: Heal Ball
description:
A remedial Poké Ball that restores
the
caught Pokémon's HP and eliminates
any status problem.

name: Quick Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild
encounter.

name: Cherish Ball
description:
A quite rare Poké Ball that has been
specially crafted to commemorate
an occasion of some sort.

name: Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

name: Antidote
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It lifts the effect of poison from
one
Pokémon.

name: Burn Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals a single Pokémon that is
suffering from a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.

name: Awakening
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It awakens a Pokémon from the
clutches of sleep.

name: Parlyz Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It eliminates paralysis from a single
Pokémon.

name: Full Restore
description:
A medicine that fully restores the HP
and heals any status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Max Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It completely restores the HP of a
single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
200 points.

name: Super Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
50 points.

name: Full Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals all the status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
Pokémon. It restores half the
Pokémon's maximum HP.

name: Max Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
Pokémon. It fully restores the
Pokémon's HP.

name: Fresh Water
description:
Water with a high mineral content.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
50 points.

name: Soda Pop
description:
A fizzy soda drink.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
60 points.

name: Lemonade
description:
A very sweet drink.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
80 points.

name: Moomoo Milk
description:
Milk with a very high nutrition
content.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
100 points.

name: EnergyPowder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
50 points.

name: Energy Root
description:
A very bitter root.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
200 points.

name: Heal Powder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It heals all the status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Revival Herb
description:
A very bitter medicinal herb.
It revives a fainted Pokémon, fully
restoring its HP.

name: Ether
description:
It restores the PP of a Pokémon's
selected move by a maximum of
10 points.

name: Max Ether
description:
It fully restores the PP of a single
selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

name: Elixir
description:
It restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted Pokémon
by 10 points each.

name: Max Elixir
description:
It fully restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted
Pokémon.

name: Lava Cookie
description:
Lavaridge Town's local specialty.
It heals all the status problems of
one Pokémon.

name: Berry Juice
description:
A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

name: Sacred Ash
description:
It revives all fainted Pokémon.
In doing so, it also fully restores
their HP.

name: HP Up
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base HP of a single
Pokémon.

name: Protein
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Attack stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Iron
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Defense stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Carbos
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Speed stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Calcium
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special
Attack) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Rare Candy
description:
A candy that is packed with energy.
It raises the level of a single
Pokémon
by one.

name: PP Up
description:
It slightly raises the maximum PP of
a selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

name: Zinc
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Def (Special
Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: PP Max
description:
It maximally raises the top PP of a
selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

name: Old Gateau
description:
Old Chateau's hidden specialty.
It heals all the status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Guard Spec.
description:
An item that prevents stat reduction
among the Trainer's party Pokémon
for five turns after use.

name: Dire Hit
description:
An item that raises the critical-hit
ratio of a Pokémon in battle. It
wears
off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Attack
description:
An item that raises the Attack stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Defend
description:
An item that raises the Defense stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description:
An item that raises the Speed stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy
description:
An item that raises the accuracy
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special
description:
An item that raises the Sp. Atk stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Def
description:
An item that raises the Sp. Def stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: Poké Doll
description:
A doll that attracts Pokémon.
Use it to flee from any battle with a
wild Pokémon.

name: Fluffy Tail
description:
An item that attracts Pokémon.
Use it to flee from any battle with a
wild Pokémon.

name: Blue Flute
description:
A blue flute made from blown glass.
Its melody awakens a single Pokémon
from sleep.

name: Yellow Flute
description:
A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

name: Red Flute
description:
A red flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of infatuation.

name: Black Flute
description:
A black flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon less
likely to appear.

name: White Flute
description:
A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.

name: Shoal Salt
description:
Pure salt that was discovered deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
It is extremely salty.

name: Shoal Shell
description:
A pretty seashell that was found deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
It is striped in blue and white.

name: Red Shard
description:
A small red shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Blue Shard
description:
A small blue shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Yellow Shard
description:
A small yellow shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Green Shard
description:
A small green shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Super Repel
description:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps
after its use.

name: Max Repel
description:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps
after its use.

name: Escape Rope
description:
A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a
cave
or a dungeon.

name: Repel
description:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps
after its use.

name: Sun Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as red as the sun.

name: Moon Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as black as the night sky.

name: Fire Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is colored orange.

name: Thunderstone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a thunderbolt pattern.

name: Water Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

name: Leaf Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

name: TinyMushroom
description:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is quite popular among certain
maniacal fan segments.

name: Big Mushroom
description:
A large and rare mushroom.
It is very popular among certain
maniacal fan segments.

name: Pearl
description:
A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

name: Big Pearl
description:
A quite-large pearl that sparkles in
a
pretty silver color. It can be sold
at
a high price to shops.

name: Stardust
description:
Lovely, red-colored sand with a
loose,
silky feel. It can be sold at a high
price to shops.

name: Star Piece
description:
A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles
in a red color. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.

name: Nugget
description:
A nugget of pure gold that gives off
a
lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.

name: Heart Scale
description:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in
the
colors of the rainbow.

name: Honey
description:
A sweet honey with a lush aroma that
attracts wild Pokémon when it is used
in grass, caves, or on special trees.

name: Growth Mulch
description:
A plant fertilizer spread on soft
soil.
It speeds up the growth of Berries.
However, it also dries the soil
faster.

name: Damp Mulch
description:
A plant fertilizer spread on soft
soil.
It slows the growth of Berries and
causes the soil to dry slower.

name: Stable Mulch
description:
A plant fertilizer spread on soft
soil.
It extends the time ripened Berries
remain on their plants before
falling.

name: Gooey Mulch
description:
A plant fertilizer spread on soft
soil.
It ups the number of times new plants
grow where mature plants withered.

name: Root Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

name: Claw Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a claw.

name: Helix Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

name: Dome Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a shell.

name: Old Amber
description:
A piece of amber that contains the
genetic material of an ancient
Pokémon.
It is clear with a reddish tint.

name: Armor Fossil
description:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that lived on the land. It appears to
be part of a collar.

name: Skull Fossil
description:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that lived on the land. It appears to
be part of a head.

name: Rare Bone
description:
A bone that is extremely valuable for
Pokémon archaeology. It can be sold
for a high price to shops.

name: Shiny Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

name: Dusk Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as dark as dark can be.

name: Dawn Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It sparkles like eyes.

name: Oval Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is shaped like an egg.

name: Odd Keystone
description:
A vital item that is needed to keep a
stone tower from collapsing. Voices
can be heard from it occasionally.

name: Griseous Orb
description:
A glowing orb to be held by GIRATINA.
It boosts the power of Dragon- and
Ghost-type moves.

name: Adamant Orb
description:
A brightly gleaming orb to be held by
DIALGA. It boosts the power of
Dragon-
and Steel-type moves.

name: Lustrous Orb
description:
A beautifully glowing orb to be held
by
PALKIA. It boosts the power of
Dragon-
and Water-type moves.

name: Grass Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
refreshingly green field.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Flame Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of
flames
in blazing red.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bubble Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
blue
world underwater.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bloom Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of
pretty
floral patterns.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Tunnel Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
dimly
lit coal mine.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Steel Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of cool
mechanical designs.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Heart Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of giant
heart patterns.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Snow Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
chilly, snow-covered world.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Space Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print
depicting
the huge expanse of space.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Air Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of
colorful letter sets.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Mosaic Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
vivid
rainbow pattern.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Brick Mail
description:
Stationery featuring a print of a
tough-looking brick pattern.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Cheri Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to recover from
paralysis.

name: Chesto Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to recover from
sleep.

name: Pecha Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to recover from
poison.

name: Rawst Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to recover from
a burn.

name: Aspear Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to defrost it.

name: Leppa Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to restore a
move's PP by 10.

name: Oran Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to heal the
user by just 10 HP.

name: Persim Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to recover from
confusion.

name: Lum Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to recover from
any status problem.

name: Sitrus Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to heal the
user's HP a little.

name: Figy Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in
a pinch, but may also cause
confusion.

name: Wiki Berry
description:
A Poffin ingredient. If held by a

description:

name: TM - Focus Punch
description:
The user focuses its mind before
launching a punch. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.

name: TM - Dragon Claw
description:
The user slashes the target with
huge, sharp claws.

name: TM - Water Pulse
description:
The user attacks the target with a
pulsing blast of water. It may also
confuse the target.

name: TM - Calm Mind
description:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and calms its spirit to raise its
Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: TM - Roar
description:
The target is scared off and
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name: TM - Toxic
description:
A move that leaves the target badly
poisoned. Its poison damage worsens
every turn.

name: TM - Snowscape
description:
A snowstorm forms on the field for 5
turns. Snow boosts the Defense stat
of Ice-types by 50%.

name: TM - Bulk Up
description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up its body, boosting both its
Attack and Defense stats.

name: TM - Bullet Seed
description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the target. Two to five seeds are
shot in rapid succession.

name: TM - Hidden Power
description:
An attack which varies in type
depending on its user. Its type may
be changed with 40 Gems.

name: TM - Sunny Day
description:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up Fire-type
moves.

name: TM - Taunt
description:
The target is taunted into a rage
that allows it to use only attack
moves for three turns.

name: TM - Ice Beam
description:
The target is struck with an
icy-cold beam of energy. It may
also freeze the target solid.

name: TM - Blizzard
description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the opposing team. It may
also freeze them solid.

name: TM - Hyper Beam
description:
The target is attacked with a
powerful beam. The user must rest
on the next turn to regain its
energy.

name: TM - Light Screen
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from special
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Protect
description:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Rain Dance
description:
The user summons a heavy rain that
falls for five turns, powering up
Water-type moves.

name: TM - Giga Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The
user's HP is restored by half the
damage taken by the target.

name: TM - Safeguard
description:
The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems for
five turns.

name: TM - Frustration
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - SolarBeam
description:
A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam
on the second turn.

name: TM - Iron Tail
description:
The target is slammed with a
steel-hard tail. It may also lower
the target's Defense stat.

name: TM - Thunderbolt
description:
A strong electric blast is loosed at
the target. It may also leave the
target with paralysis.

name: TM - Thunder
description:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on
the target to inflict damage. It
may also leave the target with
paralysis.

name: TM - Earthquake
description:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes those around it.

name: TM - Return
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

name: TM - Dig
description:
The user burrows, then attacks on
the second turn. It can also be
used to exit dungeons.

name: TM - Psychic
description:
The target is hit by a strong
telekinetic force. It may also
reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Shadow Ball
description:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the
target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM - Brick Break
description:
The user attacks with a swift chop.
It can also break any barrier such
as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: TM - Double Team
description:
By moving rapidly, the user makes
illusory copies of itself to raise
its evasiveness.

name: TM - Reflect
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from physical
attacks for five turns.

name: TM - Shock Wave
description:
The user strikes the target with a
quick jolt of electricity. This
attack cannot be evaded.

name: TM - Flamethrower
description:
The target is scorched with an
intense blast of fire. It may also
leave the target with a burn.

name: TM - Sludge Bomb
description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target. It may also poison the
target.

name: TM - Sandstorm
description:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to
hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

name: TM - Fire Blast
description:
The target is attacked with an
intense blast of all-consuming
fire. It may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: TM - Rock Tomb
description:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
It also lowers the target's Speed
by preventing its movement.

name: TM - Aerial Ace
description:
The user confounds the target with
speed, then slashes. The attack
lands without fail.

name: TM - Torment
description:
The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of
using the same move twice in a
row.

name: TM - Facade
description:
An attack move that doubles its
power if the user is poisoned,
burned, or has paralysis.

name: TM - Secret Power
description:
The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its added effects
vary depending on the user's
environment.

name: TM - Rest
description:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user's
HP and heals any status problem.

name: TM - Attract
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

name: TM - Thief
description:
An attack which steals the foe's
held item if the user isn't already
holding one. Its effects are
temporary when stealing from
Trainers.

name: TM - Steel Wing
description:
The target is hit with wings of
steel. It may also raise the user's
Defense stat.

name: TM - Skill Swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power
to exchange Abilities with the
target.

name: TM - Snatch
description:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or stat-changing move the
opponent attempts to use.

name: TM - Overheat
description:
The user attacks the target at full
power. The attack's recoil harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Roost
description:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user's HP by up to
half of its max HP.

name: TM - Focus Blast
description:
The user heightens its mental focus
and unleashes its power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - Energy Ball
description:
The user draws power from nature and
fires it at the target. It may also
lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: TM - False Swipe
description:
A restrained attack that prevents
the target from fainting. The
target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: TM - Brine
description:
If the target's HP is down to about
half, this attack will hit with
double the power.

name: TM - Fling
description:
The user flings its item at the foe,
destroying it. In PvP, only
consumable items are destroyed
permanently. The move's power and
effects vary depending on what item
is thrown.

name: TM - Charge Beam
description:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any
remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Endure
description:
The user endures any attack with at
least 1 HP. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name: TM - Dragon Pulse
description:
The target is attacked with a shock
wave generated by the user's gaping
mouth.

name: TM - Drain Punch
description:
An energy-draining punch. The user's
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

name: TM - Will-O-Wisp
description:
The user shoots a sinister,
bluish-white flame at the target to
inflict a burn.

name: TM - Silver Wind
description:
The target is attacked with powdery
scales blown by wind. It may also
raise all the user's stats.

name: TM - Embargo
description:
It prevents the target from using
its held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.

name: TM - Explosion
description:
The user explodes to inflict damage
on those around it. The user faints
upon using this move.

name: TM - Shadow Claw
description:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made from shadows. Critical hits
land more easily.

name: TM - Payback
description:
If the user moves after the target,
this attack's power will be
doubled.

name: TM - Recycle
description:
The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can
be used again.

name: TM - Giga Impact
description:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power. The user
must rest on the next turn.

name: TM - Rock Polish
description:
The user polishes its body to reduce
drag. It can sharply raise the
Speed stat.

name: TM - Flash
description:
The user flashes a bright light that
cuts the target's accuracy. It can
also be used to illuminate caves.

name: TM - Stone Edge
description:
The user stabs the foe with
sharpened stones from below. It has
a high critical-hit ratio.

name: TM - Avalanche
description:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the target in the same
turn.

name: TM - Thunder Wave
description:
A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.

name: TM - Gyro Ball
description:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swords Dance
description:
A frenetic dance to uplift the
fighting spirit. It sharply raises
the user's Attack stat.

name: TM - Stealth Rock
description:
The user lays a trap of levitating
stones around the opponent's team.
The trap hurts opponents that
switch into battle.

name: TM - Psych Up
description:
The user hypnotizes itself into
copying any stat change made by the
target.

name: TM - Captivate
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target is charmed into
harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM - Dark Pulse
description:
The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. It may
also make the target flinch.

name: TM - Rock Slide
description:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. It
may also make the targets flinch.

name: TM - X-Scissor
description:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

name: TM - Sleep Talk
description:
While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves it
knows.

name: TM - Natural Gift
description:
The user draws power to attack by
using its held Berry. The Berry
determines its type and power.

name: TM - Poison Jab
description:
The target is stabbed with a
tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
It may also poison the target.

name: TM - Dream Eater
description:
The user eats the dreams of a
sleeping target. It absorbs half
the damage caused to heal the
user's HP.

name: TM - Grass Knot
description:
The user snares the target with
grass and trips it. The heavier the
target, the greater the damage.

name: TM - Swagger
description:
The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, it also sharply
raises the target's Attack stat.

name: TM - Pluck
description:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.

name: TM - U-turn
description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

name: TM - Substitute
description:
The user makes a copy of itself
using some of its HP. The copy
serves as the user's decoy.

name: TM - Flash Cannon
description:
The user gathers all its light
energy and releases it at once. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.

name: TM - Trick Room
description:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which slower Pokémon get to move
first for five turns.

name: HM - Cut
description:
The target is cut with a scythe or a
claw. It can also be used to cut
down thin trees.

name: HM - Fly
description:
The user soars, then strikes its
target on the second turn. It can
also be used for flying to any
familiar town.

name: HM - Surf
description:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant wave. It can also be
used for crossing water.

name: HM - Strength
description:
The target is slugged with a punch
thrown at maximum power. It can
also be used to move heavy
boulders.

name: HM - Defog
description:
A strong wind blows away the
target's obstacles such as Reflect
or Light Screen. It also lowers the
target's evasiveness.

name: HM - Rock Smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch that
can shatter a rock. It may also
lower the target's Defense stat.

name: HM - Waterfall
description:
The user charges at the target and
may make it flinch. It can also be
used to climb a waterfall.

name: HM - Rock Climb
description:
The user attacks the target by
smashing into it with incredible
force. It may also confuse the
target.

name: Explorer Kit
description:
A bag filled with convenient tools
for exploring. It provides access to
the Underground.

name: Loot Sack
description:
A sturdy, spacious bag that is used
to carry loot obtained in the coal
mine.

name: Rule Book
description:
It lists the rules for holding
battles.
For linked battles, you may choose
which set of rules you wish to use.

name: Poké Radar
description:
A tool that can search out Pokémon
that are hiding in grass. Its battery
is
recharged as you walk.

name: Point Card
description:
A card that lists the Battle Points
you have earned.

name: Journal
description:
A notebook that keeps a day-to-day
record of your adventure so far.

name: Seal Case
description:
A case for storing Seals that can be
applied to the capsule cases of Poké
Balls.

name: Fashion Case
description:
A fancy case for the tidy and
organized storage of colorful Pokémon
Accessories.

name: Seal Bag
description:
A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals
for
decorating Poké Balls.

name: Pal Pad
description:
A convenient notepad that is used for
registering your friends, Friend
Codes,
and keeping a record of game play.

name: Works Key
description:
A large key for operating the doors
of
the Valley Windworks in the canyon.
It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

name: Old Charm
description:
An ancient good-luck charm made of
Pokémon bones to be taken to the
elder
of Celestic Town.

name: Galactic Key
description:
A card key for disengaging security
systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it
can result in punishment, apparently.

name: Red Chain
description:
A mythical chain that is said to link
the legendary Pokémon that created
the Sinnoh region.

name: Town Map
description:
A very convenient map that can be
viewed anytime. It even shows your
present location.

name: Vs. Seeker
description:
A device that indicates Trainers who
want to battle. Its battery charges
while you walk.

name: Coin Case
description:
A case for holding Coins obtained at
the Game Corner.
It holds up to 50,000 Coins.

name: Old Rod
description:
An old and beat-up fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Good Rod
description:
A new, good-quality fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
description:
An awesome, high-tech fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to fish
for
wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Sprayduck
description:
A watering can shaped like a PSYDUCK.
It helps promote healthy growth of
Berries planted in soft soil.

name: Poffin Case
description:
A case for storing Poffin cooked from
Berries.

name: Bicycle
description:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

name: Suite Key
description:
A key to one of the suites at the
luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd
reason, it often disappears.

name: Oak's Letter
description:
A letter from Prof. Oak.
Written in it is a request for you to
go to Rt. 224.

name: Lunar Wing
description:
A feather that glows like the moon.
It is said to possess the power to
dispel nightmares.

name: Member Card
description:
A card needed for entering the inn in
Canalave City. Oddly, the last date
marked on it was 50 years ago.

name: Azure Flute
description:
A flute that puts out echoing sounds
that do not seem to be of this world.
It is unknown who made it.

name: S.S. Ticket
description:
The ticket required for sailing on
the
ferry S.S. Anne. It has a drawing of
a
ship on it.

name: Contest Pass
description:
The pass required for entering
Pokémon
Contests. It has a drawing of an
award
ribbon on it.

name: Magma Stone
description:
A stone formed when boulders melted
in
intensely hot magma, then hardened.
Magma remains sealed inside.

name: Parcel
description:
A parcel entrusted in your care.
You are supposed to deliver it to
your
childhood friend who left Twinleaf
Town.

name: Coupon 1
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 2
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Coupon 3
description:
A coupon to be exchanged for a
Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short).
Three coupons are needed.

name: Storage Key
description:
The key to Team Galactic's sinister
warehouse located at the edge of
Veilstone City.

name: SecretPotion
description:
A fantastic medicine dispensed by the
pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully
heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

name: Vs. Recorder
description:
An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.

name: Gracidea
description:
A flower sometimes bundled in
bouquets
to convey gratitude on special
occasions like birthdays.

name: Secret Key
description:
A high-tech key that has to be used
at
a specific location. It emits a
special
electric signal to open a door.

name: Master Ball
description:
The best Ball with the ultimate level
of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

name: Ultra Ball
description:
An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.

name: Great Ball
description:
A good, high-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a standard Poké Ball.

name: Poké Ball
description:
A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the
target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

name: Safari Ball
description:
A special Poké Ball that is used only
in
the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a
camouflage pattern.

name: Net Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

name: Dive Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Pokémon that
live in the sea.

name: Nest Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on weaker
Pokémon in the wild.

name: Repeat Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Pokémon
species that were previously caught.

name: Timer Ball
description:
A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

name: Luxury Ball
description:
A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a
caught wild Pokémon quickly grow
friendly.

name: Premier Ball
description:
A somewhat rare Poké Ball that has
been specially made to commemorate
an event of some sort.

name: Dusk Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like
caves.

name: Heal Ball
description:
A remedial Poké Ball that restores
the
caught Pokémon's HP and eliminates
any status problem.

name: Quick Ball
description:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild
encounter.

name: Cherish Ball
description:
A quite rare Poké Ball that has been
specially crafted to commemorate
an occasion of some sort.

name: Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

name: Antidote
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It lifts the effect of poison from
one
Pokémon.

name: Burn Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals a single Pokémon that is
suffering from a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.

name: Awakening
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It awakens a Pokémon from the
clutches of sleep.

name: Parlyz Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It eliminates paralysis from a single
Pokémon.

name: Full Restore
description:
A medicine that fully restores the HP
and heals any status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Max Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It completely restores the HP of a
single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
200 points.

name: Super Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for wounds.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
50 points.

name: Full Heal
description:
A spray-type medicine.
It heals all the status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
Pokémon. It restores half the
Pokémon's maximum HP.

name: Max Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a fainted
Pokémon. It fully restores the
Pokémon's HP.

name: Fresh Water
description:
Water with a high mineral content.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
50 points.

name: Soda Pop
description:
A fizzy soda drink.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
60 points.

name: Lemonade
description:
A very sweet drink.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
80 points.

name: Moomoo Milk
description:
Milk with a very high nutrition
content.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
100 points.

name: EnergyPowder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
50 points.

name: Energy Root
description:
A very bitter root.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
200 points.

name: Heal Powder
description:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It heals all the status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Revival Herb
description:
A very bitter medicinal herb.
It revives a fainted Pokémon, fully
restoring its HP.

name: Ether
description:
It restores the PP of a Pokémon's
selected move by a maximum of
10 points.

name: Max Ether
description:
It fully restores the PP of a single
selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

name: Elixir
description:
It restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted Pokémon
by 10 points each.

name: Max Elixir
description:
It fully restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted
Pokémon.

name: Lava Cookie
description:
Lavaridge Town's local specialty.
It heals all the status problems of
one Pokémon.

name: Berry Juice
description:
A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

name: Sacred Ash
description:
It revives all fainted Pokémon.
In doing so, it also fully restores
their HP.

name: HP Up
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base HP of a single
Pokémon.

name: Protein
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Attack stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Iron
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Defense stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Carbos
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Speed stat of a
single Pokémon.

name: Calcium
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special
Attack) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Rare Candy
description:
A candy that is packed with energy.
It raises the level of a single
Pokémon
by one.

name: PP Up
description:
It slightly raises the maximum PP of
a selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

name: Zinc
description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
It raises the base Sp. Def (Special
Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.

name: PP Max
description:
It maximally raises the top PP of a
selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

name: Old Gateau
description:
Old Chateau's hidden specialty.
It heals all the status problems of a
single Pokémon.

name: Guard Spec.
description:
An item that prevents stat reduction
among the Trainer's party Pokémon
for five turns after use.

name: Dire Hit
description:
An item that raises the critical-hit
ratio of a Pokémon in battle. It
wears
off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Attack
description:
An item that raises the Attack stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Defend
description:
An item that raises the Defense stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description:
An item that raises the Speed stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy
description:
An item that raises the accuracy
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special
description:
An item that raises the Sp. Atk stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Def
description:
An item that raises the Sp. Def stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: Poké Doll
description:
A doll that attracts Pokémon.
Use it to flee from any battle with a
wild Pokémon.

name: Fluffy Tail
description:
An item that attracts Pokémon.
Use it to flee from any battle with a
wild Pokémon.

name: Blue Flute
description:
A blue flute made from blown glass.
Its melody awakens a single Pokémon
from sleep.

name: Yellow Flute
description:
A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

name: Red Flute
description:
A red flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of infatuation.

name: Black Flute
description:
A black flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon less
likely to appear.

name: White Flute
description:
A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.

name: Shoal Salt
description:
Pure salt that was discovered deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
It is extremely salty.

name: Shoal Shell
description:
A pretty seashell that was found deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
It is striped in blue and white.

name: Red Shard
description:
A small red shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Blue Shard
description:
A small blue shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Yellow Shard
description:
A small yellow shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Green Shard
description:
A small green shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

name: Super Repel
description:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps
after its use.

name: Max Repel
description:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps
after its use.

name: Escape Rope
description:
A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a
cave
or a dungeon.

name: Repel
description:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps
after its use.

name: Sun Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as red as the sun.

name: Moon Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as black as the night sky.

name: Fire Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is colored orange.

name: Thunderstone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a thunderbolt pattern.

name: Water Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

name: Leaf Stone
description:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

name: TinyMushroom
description:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is quite popular among certain
maniacal fan segments.

name: Big Mushroom
description:
A large and rare mushroom.
It is very popular among certain
maniacal fan segments.

name: Pearl
description:
A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

name: Big Pearl
description:
A quite-large pearl that sparkles in
a
pretty silver color. It can be sold
at
a high price to shops.

name: Stardust
description:
Lovely, red-colored sand with a
loose,
silky feel. It can be sold at a high
price to shops.

name: Star Piece
description:
A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles
in a red color. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.

name: Nugget
description:
A nugget of pure gold that gives off
a
lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.

name: Heart Scale
description:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in
the
colors of the rainbow.

name: Honey
description:
A sweet honey with a lush aroma that
attracts wild Pokémon when it is used
in grass, caves, or on special trees.

name: Growth Mulch
description:
A fertilizer to be spread on soft
soil.
It speeds up the growth of Berries.
However, it also dries the soil
faster.

name: Damp Mulch
description:
A fertilizer to be spread on soft
soil.
It slows the growth of Berries and
causes the soil to dry slower.

name: Stable Mulch
description:
A fertilizer to be spread on soft
soil.
It extends the time ripened Berries

name: Gooey Mulch
description:
A fertilizer to be spread on soft
soil.
It ups the number of times new plants

name: Root Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

name: Claw Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a claw.

name: Helix Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

name: Dome Fossil
description:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a shell.

name: Old Amber
description:

It is clear with a reddish tint.

name: Armor Fossil
description:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that lived on the land. It appears to
be part of a collar.

name: Skull Fossil
description:
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that lived on the land. It appears to
be part of a head.

name: Rare Bone
description:
A bone that is extremely valuable for
Pokémon archaeology. It can be sold

name: Shiny Stone

species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

name: Dusk Stone

species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as dark as dark can be.

name: Dawn Stone

It sparkles like eyes.

name: Oval Stone

species of Pokémon evolve.
It is shaped like an egg.

name: Odd Keystone

name: Griseous Orb
description:

Ghost-type moves.

name: Adamant Orb

and Steel-type moves.

name: Lustrous Orb

by

and Water-type moves.

name: BrightPowder

snaps the holder out of infatuation.

name: Choice Band
description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
This headband ups Attack, but allows
the use of only one kind of move.

any
